str.value: You can retire your rogue by typing "%s" in the text field and pressing
str.local: 若你想将你的游侠退役，可以在文本输入框内输入" %s" 然后按下"%s" 按钮。注意：这样做 将杀死你当前的游侠，没有后悔药。

str.value: the "%s" button. Note, however, that doing so will kill your current
rogue and there is no undo button available.
You can delete your account by typing "%s" in the text field and
str.local: 若你想删除你的账号，可以在文本输入框内输入 "% s" 然后按下 "%s" 按钮。注意：这样做 将删除所有的数据，管理员只有在记录还在的情况下才可 能恢复。

str.value: pressing the "%s" button. Note, however, that doing so will delete
all data and it can only be recovered by the admin while the logs exist.
You can add an optional key bind on each action by
str.local: 你可以为每个动作绑定一个额外的按键，

str.value: focusing one of the buttons and pressing any other
str.local: 只需聚焦到特定按钮，然后按下
除了 %s，%s，%s 以及 %s 之外的键。

str.value: A key bind can be removed by clicking the button.
str.local: 点一下按钮可以清除与之绑定的按键。

str.value: Injecting blood into daemons, please wait...
str.local: 正在给恶魔注入鲜血，请稍候……

str.value: This key shows the items on the ground while it is pressed.
str.local: 这个按键按下时显示地上的物品。

str.value: This key is used with the movement keys to carry out actions such as pick lock, disarm trap and open door.
str.local: 这个键和移动键一起按可进行开锁、解除陷阱、开 门等动作。

str.value: This key is used with a hotkey to self cast spells, equip weapons in the offhand and to equip a ring on the offhand finger.
str.local: 这个键和热键一起按可对自己施法，在副手上装备 武器，以及在副手手指上装备戒指。

str.value: This key is used to accept interface choices and to climb stairs up and down.
str.local: 这个键用来在界面上确认，上下楼梯。

str.value: Hotkeys can be used to quickly cast spells and use talents.
str.local: 热键用来快速施法、使用天赋。

str.value: You can bind a hotkey by pressing it while having the desired spell or talent selected in the spellbook window.
str.local: 你可以在法术书窗口里选中喜欢的法术或天赋，同 时按下热键进行绑定。

str.value: This key shows the text field that can be used to send instant messages to other players (online only).
str.local: 这个键用来弹出一个文本输入框，用来向其他玩家 发送即时消息（仅用于在线模式）。

str.value: This key can be used to jump in one of the four main directions (north, south, east, west).
str.local: 这个键用来向四个主方向（东南西北）跳跃。

str.value: This key quickly swaps between the primary weapon set and the secondary weapon set.
str.local: 这个键用来在主武器组和备选武器组之间快速切换 。

str.value: This key brings up the inventory window with an option to equip and unequip items.
str.local: 这个键用来弹出物品界面，并进行装备和解除装备 。
这个键会整理背包内的物品。

str.value: This key is used to quickly travel back to town after the current level has been cleared.
str.local: 这个键用来在当前楼层探查完毕后快速返城。

str.value: This key brings up the attack cursor that can be used to attack enemies with ranged weapons.
str.local: 这个键带出攻击光标，用远程武器攻击敌人。

str.value: This key is used to search the surroundings for traps and hidden features.
str.local: 这个键用来搜索周围的陷阱及隐藏物。

str.value: This key shows the inventory window with an option to drop items.
str.local: 这个键弹出物品界面，并开始丢弃物品。

str.value: This key shows the inventory window with an option to throw items.
str.local: 这个键弹出物品界面，并开始投掷物品。

str.value: This key brings up the focus cursor that can be used to order allies to focus on the chosen target.
str.local: 这个键带出聚焦光标，用来指挥盟友聚焦到选择的 目标上。

str.value: This key shows the spellbook that can be used to use talents and cast known spells.
str.local: 这个键弹出法术书界面，使用其中的天赋或法术。

str.value: This key brings up the look cursor that can be used to take a closer look at a target within range.
str.local: 这个键弹出观察光标，用来观察范围内的物体。

str.value: This key moves the player or cursor up.
str.local: 这个键将玩家或光标向上移动。

str.value: This key moves the player or cursor down.
str.local: 这个键将玩家或光标向下移动。

str.value: This key moves the player or cursor right.
str.local: 这个键将玩家或光标向右移动。

str.value: This key moves the player or cursor left.
str.local: 这个键将玩家或光标向左移动。

str.value: This key moves the player or cursor up and right.
str.local: 这个键将玩家或光标向右上移动。

str.value: This key moves the player or cursor down and right.
str.local: 这个键将玩家或光标向右下移动。

str.value: This key moves the player or cursor up and left.
str.local: 这个键将玩家或光标向左上移动。

str.value: This key moves the player or cursor down and left.
str.local: 这个键将玩家或光标向左下移动。

str.value: This key is used to rest for one turn.
str.local: 这个键用来休息一个回合。

str.value: Note that Keypad 5 requires that Num Lock is on and the 5 is a dead key otherwise (game engine feature).
str.local: 注意：小键盘 5 必须在小键盘灯亮起时才有效，否 则无效（游戏引擎限制）。

str.id: Hover mouse over the checkboxes to find out how to unlock them.
str.value: Hover mouse over the checkboxes to find out how to unlock them.
str.local: 把鼠标停留在勾选框上看看如何解锁它们。

str.id: Sets the account name when the program is launched.
str.value: Sets the account name when the program is launched.
str.local: 在程序启动后设置一个账号名称。

str.id: Enables the use of a Playstation 4 gamepad.
str.value: Enables the use of a Playstation 4 gamepad.
str.local: 开启 Playstation 4 手柄支持。

str.value: In order to use other gamepads, enable this and type /gamepad in the game to calibrate them.
str.local: 若需使用其它手柄，开启它后在游戏中输入 /gamepad 来校正手柄。

str.value: You have entered the Market Quarter and here you can trade items with various merchants.
str.local: 你进入了商业集市，这里可以和各式 商人交易物品。

str.value: Note that once the merchants' inventories are filled with junk, you can reset them by resting in the inn.
str.local: 注意：如果商人的货架被垃圾堆满的 话，你可以通过在旅店休息重置它们 。

str.value: You have entered Leo's Workshop and here you can have items crafted in exchange for materials and a few gold coins.
str.local: 你进入了鲁班的工坊，在这里你可以 交纳一些材料和一点金币打造你要的 物品。

str.value: If you have crafting materials, schematics or gold, you can store them here to free up some inventory space.
str.local: 如果你有制造材料，图纸或金币，你 可以免费存放在这里。

str.value: Note that only stored materials can be used for crafting (drop an item to store it).
str.local: 注意：仓储材料只可被用于制造（将 物品拖进来可以存放它）。

str.value: You have entered the Artisans' Guild and here you can have your items repaired.
str.local: 你进入了工匠行会，在这里你可以修 理你的物品。

str.value: If you have unique items, you can donate them to the guild with a drag and drop.
str.local: 如果你获得了独特物品，可以通过拖 拽进行会捐献它们。

str.value: If you have unidentified charms, you can identify them for free by attempting to donate them to the guild.
str.local: 如果你有未鉴定的项链，你可以尝试 将它们捐献给行会来获得免费鉴定。

str.value: Note that if you ever need to return some quest item then this is the place to do so.
str.local: 注意：如果你需要返还一些任务物品 ，这里就是做这事的地方。

str.value: You have entered the Diviners' Guild and here you can have your items identified.
str.local: 你进入了占卜师行会，在这里你可以 鉴定你的物品。

str.value: You have entered the Wizards' Guild and here you can have your items enchanted.
str.local: 你进入了法师行会，在这里你可以对 你的物品附魔。

str.value: Items can usually have one enchant on them and blessed items can have two enchants.
str.local: 物品通常可以附魔一次，但被祝福的 物品可以附魔两次。

str.value: When you enchant an item you are given an option to choose from three possible outcomes.
str.local: 每当你对物品附魔时，你可以在三个 效果中选择一个。

str.value: You can also cancel the selection in which case nothing changes, but you will not get your gold back.
str.local: 你可以取消选择而中止附魔，但是没 有退款。

str.value: Note that some items, such as thrown weapons, do not give you a choice because they have their own rules for enchanting.
str.local: 注意：一些物品，比如投掷类武器， 没有选择因为它们有自己的附魔规则 。

str.value: You have entered the Shrine of Nibar and here you can remove curses and magical effects for a minor donation.
str.local: 你进入了力霸神殿，在这里你可以移 除诅咒或魔法效果，但需要一点香火 钱。

str.value: You have entered the Shrine of Fubar and here you can remove poison and disease effects for a minor donation.
str.local: 你进入了福霸神殿，在这里你可以移 除毒害或疾病效果，但需要一点香火 钱。

str.value: You have entered the Frostmourn Inn where you can feast and rest while time passes by.
str.local: 你进入了霜之哀伤旅店，在这里你可以饱餐 休息让时光流逝。

str.value: If you choose to stay in the inn you will be fully healed and your hunger and thirst will be satiated.
str.local: 如果你选择住进旅店，你的生命将完全恢复 ，饱腹度和饥渴度都将回到满足状态。

str.value: Another thing that happens is that the merchants in the Market Quarter will have their stocks reset.
str.local: 另一件事情将会发生，商业集市里的商人会 重置他的货物。

str.value: Finally, you will hear about a new dungeon nearby, which allows you to reset your current dungeon.
str.local: 最后，你将打听到附近一座新的地牢，这意 味着你当前的地牢将重置。

str.value: Note that this also increases your chance of finding a random encounter when you do clear a dungeon.
str.local: 注意：这还会提升下一次你清空地牢后发生 一场随机遭遇战的机会。

str.value: Whether you have explored the current dungeon or spent some time feasting and resting, it matters not.
str.local: 你是否探索完当前的地牢，或是在旅 店休整了一段时间，这并不重要。

str.value: You are now ready to face new challenges just as soon as you want.
str.local: 如你所愿，现在你准备接受新的挑战 。

str.value: Be warned, however, that you should make sure you are fully prepared for anything that might show up...
str.local: 然而要提醒的是，你要确定是否做好 了面对一切的完全准备……

str.id: You donate %d gold coins and %s is removed.
str.value: You donate %d gold coins and %s is removed.
str.local: 你捐了 %d 金币移除了 %s 。

str.id: You can't afford to donate %d gold coins.
str.value: You can't afford to donate %d gold coins.
str.local: 你付不起 %d 金币的捐赠。

str.id: Shrine of Nibar thanks you and all curse and magic effects are removed.
str.value: Shrine of Nibar thanks you and all curse and magic effects are removed.
str.local: 力霸神殿神殿答谢你，所有的诅咒和魔法效果都移除了。

str.id: Shrine of Fubar thanks you and all poison and disease effects are removed.
str.value: Shrine of Fubar thanks you and all poison and disease effects are removed.
str.local: 福霸神殿答谢你，所有的毒害和疾病都移除了。

str.id: You can't donate when there's nothing wrong with you.
str.value: You can't donate when there's nothing wrong with you.
str.local: 你没啥毛病时不能捐献。

str.id: You choose to leave and the Wizards' Guild thanks you for your donation.
str.value: You choose to leave and the Wizards' Guild thanks you for your donation.
str.local: 你选择离开，法师行会感谢你的捐赠。

str.id: You feast and rest in the inn as time passes by.
str.value: You feast and rest in the inn as time passes by.
str.local: 你在旅店吃饱喝足，休整了一段时间。

str.id: You can't afford to feast and rest in the inn.
str.value: You can't afford to feast and rest in the inn.
str.local: 你的钱不够在旅店休整。

str.id: You leave the town and enter the dungeon.
str.value: You leave the town and enter the dungeon.
str.local: 你离开城镇进入了地牢。

str.id: You leave the dungeon and enter the town.
str.value: You leave the dungeon and enter the town.
str.local: 你离开地牢进入了城镇。

str.id: Some of your friends may have gotten lost in the process.
str.value: Some of your friends may have gotten lost in the process.
str.local: 在这个过程中，你的一些伙伴可能走失。

str.id: You prepare yourself for the new challenge ahead...
str.value: You prepare yourself for the new challenge ahead...
str.local: 你整装待发迎接新的挑战……

str.id: You tell your friends to head out to the new dungeon...
str.value: You tell your friends to head out to the new dungeon...
str.local: 你通知你的伙伴出发去新的地牢……

str.id: Failed to load map [%s]. Perhaps you should contact the developer...
str.value: Failed to load map [%s]. Perhaps you should contact the developer...
str.local: 加载地图 [%s] 失败。或许你应该联系开发者……

str.id: %s is now properly buried at the shrine of the forgotten heroes and %s should not haunt us anymore.
str.value: %s is now properly buried at the shrine of the forgotten heroes and %s should not haunt us anymore.
str.local: %s 火化于被遗忘的英雄神殿，%s 不会再伤害我们了。

str.id: Press the arrow pad up button...
str.value: Press the arrow pad up button...

str.id: Press the arrow pad right button...
str.value: Press the arrow pad right button...

str.id: Press the arrow pad down button...
str.value: Press the arrow pad down button...

str.id: Press the arrow pad left button...
str.value: Press the arrow pad left button...

str.id: Press the button pad top button...
str.value: Press the button pad top button...

str.id: Press the button pad right button...
str.value: Press the button pad right button...

str.id: Press the button pad bottom button...
str.value: Press the button pad bottom button...

str.id: Press the button pad left button...
str.value: Press the button pad left button...

str.id: Press the touchpad or system button...
str.value: Press the touchpad or system button...
str.local: 按下触摸板或系统按钮……

str.id: Press okay to save or [Escape] to cancel...
str.value: Press okay to save or [Escape] to cancel...
str.local: 按下确认保存或 [Escape] 取消……

str.id: Press okay to calibrate or [Escape] to cancel.
str.value: Press okay to calibrate or [Escape] to cancel.
str.local: 按下确认校正或 [Escape] 取消……

str.id: I was born to do this!
str.value: I was born to do this!
Some travelers are staying in the inn and they claim to have seen %s in a dungeon nearby.
str.local: 待在旅店中的旅客声称在附近的地牢 中见过 %s 。

str.value: The travelers don't seem like much of a dungeon dwellers but they are certainly greedier than your average rogue.
str.local: 这些旅客看起来不太像地牢中的怪兽 ，但肯定比你们这些游侠更贪婪。

str.value: If you want to learn the location of the dungeon and %s, you will have to pay dearly for it.
str.local: 如果你想打听地牢的位置以及 %s ， 你需要必须付点钱。

str.value: You pay the travelers and head out to face %s.
str.local: 你付了钱给旅客，出发去找 %s 。

str.value: The master artificer Leo Noerde has been taken hostage and the Artisan's Guild is looking for someone to rescue him.
str.local: 工匠大师鲁班被捉为人质，工匠行会 正在招募人选去解救他。

str.value: There seems to be no reward for whatever reason, but you never know what might happen if he is rescued.
str.local: 不知道为什么，这个任务看起来没有 报酬，但是你无法预知救了他会发生 什么。

str.value: Note that once you accept the quest you must finish it before leaving the dungeon or the quest will fail.
str.local: 注意，一旦你接受了任务，你就必须 在离开地牢前完成这个任务，否则就 算任务失败。

str.value: You accept the quest and head out to save the artificer.
str.local: 你接受了任务，出发拯救工匠。

str.value: Apparently a chronomancer, whatever that is, went to study some ancient sewer and hasn't been seen in a while.
str.local: 很明显，有个时空术士，别管他是谁 ，前往调研古代下水道，有一段时间 没再看见他了。

str.value: Leo Noerde wants you to find out what happened to him and return back any unique items he may have found.
str.local: 鲁班想让你去看看他怎样了，把他找 到的独特物品带回来。

str.value: Note that once you accept the quest you must finish it before leaving the dungeon or the quest will fail.
str.local: 注意，一旦你接受了任务，你就必须 在离开地牢前完成这个任务，否则就 算任务失败。

str.value: You accept the quest and head out to find any unique items.
str.local: 你接受了任务，出发寻找独特物品。

str.value: It seems that some eight-legged rabbits have made their nest too close to a wealthy merchant's trade route.
str.local: 似乎有一些八条腿的兔子把它们的窝 筑得离富商的贸易路线太近了。

str.value: Your job is to kill them all and in return you will have 1000 gold coins deposited into your bank account.
str.local: 你的工作是消灭它们。作为回报，将 有 1000 金币存入你的银行账户。

str.value: Note that once you accept the quest you must finish it before leaving the dungeon or the quest will fail.
str.local: 注意，一旦你接受了任务，你就必须 在离开地牢前完成这个任务，否则就 算任务失败。

str.value: You accept the quest and head out to slay some spiders.
str.local: 你接受了任务，出发去杀蜘蛛。

str.value: Every time you go to sleep another death cult appears. These guys have even come up with their own spells.
str.local: 每次你睡觉时，另一些死亡信徒就会 出现。这些家伙甚至想出了自己的法 术。

str.value: The Wizard's Guild doesn't seem to like competition and they would like you to go and take care of the problem.
str.local: 法师行会似乎不喜欢竞争，他们希望 你去解决这个问题。

str.value: Note that once you accept the quest you must finish it before leaving the dungeon or the quest will fail.
str.local: 注意，一旦你接受了任务，你就必须 在离开地牢前完成这个任务，否则就 算任务失败。

str.value: You accept the quest and head out to do some justified murdering.
str.local: 你接受了任务，出发去执行正当的刺杀。

str.value: Some cultists have come up with a plan to take over the world by waking up an old monster that should've stayed dead.
str.local: 一些邪教徒开启了一个计划，想唤醒 一个本已死去的老怪物来征服世界。

str.value: Obviously that is bad but what is even worse is that those cultists are carrying a lot of gold that should be yours.
str.local: 这当然很糟糕，但还有更糟的事情是 那些邪教徒带走了本该属于你的大量 金币。

str.value: Note that once you accept the quest you must finish it before leaving the dungeon or the quest will fail.
str.local: 注意，一旦你接受了任务，你就必须 在离开地牢前完成这个任务，否则就 算任务失败。

str.value: You accept the quest and head out to face the cultists in their lair.
str.local: 你接受了任务，出发前往邪教徒的巢穴。

str.value: Bad guys are drawn here like moths to the flames and the latest one goes by the title of Dreadlord.
str.local: 坏人就像飞蛾扑火般涌现在这里，最 后一个出现的是黑暗之主。

str.value: You probably should be on your way by now, because if you don't go and snatch the loot, someone else will!
str.local: 或许你要上路了，因为如果你不去抢 夺战利品，就会有人捷足先登！

str.value: Note that once you accept the quest you must finish it before leaving the dungeon or the quest will fail.
str.local: 注意，一旦你接受了任务，你就必须 在离开地牢前完成这个任务，否则就 算任务失败。

str.value: You accept the quest and head out to face the Dreadlord in his castle.
str.local: 你接受了任务，出发去黑暗之主的城堡面对挑战。

str.value: You are now deemed strong enough to challenge %s for the throne.
str.local: 你现在已经强大到可以去挑战 %s 夺 取王位。

str.value: Should you wish to issue the challenge, you can do so now.
str.local: 你想面对挑战吗，现在就可以去了。

str.value: Note that once you do so there is no way to come back and failure in this quest means death.
str.local: 注意，一旦你接受了任务，你就必须 在离开地牢前完成这个任务，否则就 算任务失败。

str.value: You issue a challenge to %s and enter the Frostmourn Keep.
str.local: 你接受了针对 %s 的挑战，进入了霜之哀伤城楼。

str.value: You can't afford to pay the required fee.
You have found the quest item. You should probably head back and turn it in.
str.local: 你找到了任务物品。现在应该回去归还它。

str.id: %s yells: Very well coward, have it your way!
str.value: %s yells: Very well coward, have it your way!

str.local: %s 喊道：滚去你的坟墓，懦夫！

str.id: Orc boss yells: Wraaagh kek Hulk!
str.value: Orc boss yells: Wraaagh kek Hulk!
str.local: 兽人首领喊道：Wraaagh kek Hulk!
骑士喊道：干掉那个流浪者!!!

str.id: Wizard yells: Who dares to insult the Sacred Order of the Pink?!?
str.value: Wizard yells: Who dares to insult the Sacred Order of the Pink?!?
str.local: 法师喊道：谁敢侮辱神圣的粉色骑士团?!?

str.id: Prince Altren yells: Find %s and bring me %s head!
str.value: Prince Altren yells: Find %s and bring me %s head!

str.local: 增加力量和耐力属性，增强火焰抗 性、冰霜抗性和震击抗性。

str.value: Allows you to cast spells at any target within line of sight or halves the spell to-hit range modifier.
str.local: 允许你对视线内的任何目标施放法 术，或是将施法命中距离修正减半 。

str.value: Heals the target creature and attempts to restore one point of ability damage.
str.local: 治疗目标生物并尝试回复一点属性 伤害。

str.value: Heals the target creature and all adjacent creatures.
str.local: 治疗目标生物及所有和该目标邻接 的生物。

str.value: Places a heal over time effect on the target creature.
str.local: 赋予目标生物一个治疗的持续效果 。

str.value: Causes magic damage or instantly kills the target undead creature.
str.local: 立刻杀死目标不死生物，或对其造 成魔法伤害。

str.value: Places a magical effect on you that amplifies the damage of orb spells.
str.local: 赋予你一个持续效果，它可以增强 法术球的伤害。

str.value: Causes shock damage to the target creature and has a chance of paralysing the target.
str.local: 对目标生物造成震击伤害，有一定 机会使目标麻痹。

str.value: Causes fire damage to the target creature and has a chance of setting the target on fire.
str.local: 对目标生物造成火焰伤害，有一定 机会使目标燃烧。

str.value: Causes frost damage to the target creature and has a chance of slowing the target.
str.local: 对目标生物造成冰霜伤害，有一定 机会使目标迟缓。

str.value: Places a magical effect on all creatures within line of sight that increases light and search radius.
str.local: 对视线内所有生物附加一个魔法效 果，增加他们的亮度和搜索范围。

str.value: Places a magical effect on you that increases all resistances (the effect is removed if your equipment changes).
str.local: 给你附加一个魔法效果，增强所有 的抗性（这个效果会在变更装备时 移除）。

str.value: Creates a duplicate of the caster that can distract enemies.

str.value: Allows the caster to magically use remote objects such as doors, chests, levers and so on.

str.value: Causes magic damage or instantly kills the target daemon.
str.local: 立刻杀死目标恶魔，或对其造成魔 法伤害。

str.value: Attempts to place a random curse effect on the target creature or Curse of Agony if the check fails.

str.value: Places a magical effect on you that forces attackers to take a fear check.
str.local: 给你施加一个魔法效果，任何试图 攻击你的生物都必须先通过一次恐 惧检定。

str.value: Attempts to temporarily charm a daemon and make it your friend.
str.local: 尝试临时魅惑一个恶魔，使其成为 你的伙伴。

str.value: Attempts to teleport the caster to another location within line of sight.
str.local: 将施法者立即传送到视野内的另一 个位置。

str.value: Releases a soul from a random soul gem on the target creature or an item in the caster's inventory.
str.local: 将魂晶中的灵魂释放到目标生物或 是施法者物品栏中的物品上。

str.value: Attempts to summon a daemon and then attempts to enslave it.
str.local: 尝试召唤一个恶魔并尝试奴役它。

str.value: Causes poison damage to the target creature and has a chance of applying a random poison effect.
str.local: 对目标生物造成毒伤害，有一定机 会附加一个随机的毒害效果。

str.value: Causes disease damage to the target creature and has a chance of applying a random disease effect.
str.local: 对目标生物造成疾病伤害，有一定 机会附加一个随机的疾病效果。

str.value: Creates a shield around the caster that absorbs damage until it breaks.
str.local: 在施法者周围创建出一层护盾，护 盾会吸收伤害直至破碎。

str.value: Summons a lesser daemon at the target location and enslaves it.
str.local: 在目标位置召唤一个小点的恶魔， 并奴役它。

str.value: Identifies the targeted item in the caster's inventory.
str.local: 鉴定施法者物品栏中的指定物品。

str.value: Enchants the targeted item in the caster's inventory with a random enchant.
str.local: 给施法者物品栏中指定物品进行一 次随机附魔。

str.value: Causes fire, frost and shock damage to the target and all adjacent creatures.
str.local: 对目标生物及它的邻接生物造成火 焰、冰霜和震击伤害。

str.value: Creates a clone of the target creature that aids the caster for awhile.
str.local: 给目标生物制造一个克隆体，它能 协助施法者一小段时间。

str.value: Permanently turns a dead human into an undead familiar.
str.local: 永久的将一个死去的人类转变为一 个亡灵朋友。

str.value: Transmutes the targeted item in the caster's inventory into gold coins.
str.local: 将施法者物品栏中的目标物品炼成 金币。

str.value: Increases or decreases the height of terrain on even or odd turns respectively.
str.local: 在偶数回合抬高，在奇数回合降低 地块高度。

str.value: Causes magic damage or instantly kills the target creature.
str.local: 立刻杀死目标生物，或对其造成魔 法伤害。

str.value: Attempts to disarm, knock back and stun the target creature.
str.local: 尝试缴械，击退并眩晕目标生物。

str.value: Attempts to control the target beast and make it your friend.
str.local: 尝试控制目标野兽，使它成为你的 伙伴。

str.value: Attempts to remove a bleeding wound from the target creature.
Spawns a treeman from the target mushroom patch.
str.local: 从目标蘑菇碎片中孵化一个树人。

str.value: Places a magical effect on you that makes you levitate.
str.local: 在你身上放置一个魔法效果，使你 浮空。

str.value: Attempts to overcome the target creature with various effects.
str.local: 尝试用各种效果战胜目标生物。

str.value: Tears open a wound and causes the target to bleed.
str.local: 将目标撕开一个伤害，让其流血。

str.value: Throws a random blood cap from the caster's inventory and explodes it on impact.
str.local: 从施法者物品栏中随机扔出一个血 蘑菇，制造一个爆炸。

str.value: Attempts to soothe the target beast and make it neutral towards you.
str.local: 尝试安抚目标野兽，使它对你保持 中立。

str.value: Summons a pack of ethereal spirit wolves at the target location.
str.local: 在目标位置召唤出一组超凡的狼精 。

str.value: Summons an abyssal claw at the target location.
str.local: 在目标位置召唤一个深渊之爪。

str.value: Consumes all soul gems in your inventory to spawn an army of the dead.
str.local: 消耗掉你的物品栏中所有的魂晶， 孵化出一个亡灵军团。

str.value: Creates a corrupting cloud at the target location hitting everyone inside.
str.local: 在目标位置制造一片腐蚀之云，攻 击其中的所有人。

str.value: Summons dancing weapons at the target location.
str.local: 在目标位置召唤出跳舞的武器。

str.value: Causes magic damage based on the remaining energy and maximum mana shield of the target creature.
str.local: 根据目标生物残存的精力数和魔法 盾最大值造成魔法伤害。

str.value: Attempts to unsummon all summoned creatures within line of sight.
str.local: 尝试对视线中所有召唤出来的生物 解除召唤。

str.value: Attempts to knock back and stun all adjacent creatures.
str.local: 尝试击退所有邻接的生物，并眩晕 他们。

str.value: Attempts to sacrifice a creature at the center of the nearest sacrificial circle.
str.local: 尝试在最近的献祭环中央献祭一个 生物。

str.value: Conjures a 3x3 sacrificial circle at the target location.
str.local: 在目标位置施法变出一个 3x3 的献 祭环。

str.value: Teleports you to the nearest sacrificial circle or a random location if none exists.
str.local: 将你传送到最近的一个献祭环中， 如果没有则传送到随机位置。

str.id: You gain clearcasting and cast the spell for free.
str.value: You gain clearcasting and cast the spell for free.
str.local: 你获得沉静施法，本次施法免费。

str.id: You have a feeling that the spell didn't come out right.
str.value: You have a feeling that the spell didn't come out right.
str.local: 你感觉法术不能正确的施放出来。

str.id: But apparently the spell just fizzles.
str.value: But apparently the spell just fizzles.

str.id: The spell's energy discharges from every orifice.
str.value: The spell's energy discharges from every orifice.
str.local: 该法术的能量从每一个出口释放。

str.id: A sudden sensation of horror overcomes you.
str.value: A sudden sensation of horror overcomes you.
str.local: 一个恐怖的感觉笼罩着你。

str.id: Your lips can't seem to keep up with your brain.
str.value: Your lips can't seem to keep up with your brain.
str.local: 你的嘴唇似乎跟不上你的大脑。

str.id: The spell drains you dry before fizzling out.
str.value: The spell drains you dry before fizzling out.
str.local: 这个法术在失败前抽干了你。

str.id: You suddenly see things from a new perspective.
str.value: You suddenly see things from a new perspective.
str.local: 你突然从一个新的视角看问题。

str.id: You shift to a new location.
str.value: You shift to a new location.
str.local: 你传送到了一个新的位置。

str.id: The soul's magical energy hits you.
str.value: The soul's magical energy hits you.

str.id: %s misses its target and hits %s instead.
str.value: %s misses its target and hits %s instead.

str.id: You have learned a new talent.
str.value: You have learned a new talent.

str.id: The chasm fills up and becomes a floor.
str.value: The chasm fills up and becomes a floor.

str.id: The floor rises up and becomes a wall.
str.value: The floor rises up and becomes a wall.

str.id: The wall crumbles and reveals a floor.
str.value: The wall crumbles and reveals a floor.

str.id: The floor crumbles and reveals a chasm.
str.value: The floor crumbles and reveals a chasm.

str.id: %s seems to calm down and is no longer hostile.
str.value: %s seems to calm down and is no longer hostile.

str.id: %s radiates divine light for a moment.
str.value: %s radiates divine light for a moment.

str.local: 你将%s点化为 %d 枚金币。

str.id: You transmute %s into a gold coin.
str.value: You transmute %s into a gold coin.

str.id: You transmute some of your chest hairs into gold particles.
str.value: You transmute some of your chest hairs into gold particles.
str.local: 你将你的胸毛点化成黄金微粒。

str.id: %s glows blue for a moment before shattering to pieces.
str.value: %s glows blue for a moment before shattering to pieces.
str.local: %s散发出一束蓝色的光芒随之粉碎。

str.id: You feel that you have forgotten something.
str.value: You feel that you have forgotten something.

str.id: You feel dumber than a rock.
str.value: You feel dumber than a rock.
str.local: 你觉得自己比石头还笨。

str.id: You reset the legendary effect on your %s.
str.value: You reset the legendary effect on your %s.
str.local: 你在你的%s上重置了传奇效果。

str.id: %s legendary effect is imbued in your %s.
str.value: %s legendary effect is imbued in your %s.
str.local: %s 传奇效果被灌注到你的%s内。

str.id: %s worn on your main hand is destroyed.
str.value: %s worn on your main hand is destroyed.
str.local: 你主手装备的%s被摧毁了。

str.id: %s worn on your offhand is destroyed.
str.value: %s worn on your offhand is destroyed.
str.local: 你副手装备的%s被摧毁了。

str.id: Your %s slips from your hand and is unequipped.
str.value: Your %s slips from your hand and is unequipped.
str.local: 你的%s从主手滑落，卸了下来。

str.id: Your %s slips from your hand and falls to the ground.
str.value: Your %s slips from your hand and falls to the ground.
str.local: 你的%s从主手滑落，掉在地上。

str.id: %s's %s slips and falls to the ground.
str.value: %s's %s slips and falls to the ground.

str.id: Your %s slips from your hand and is stolen by %s.
str.value: Your %s slips from your hand and is stolen by %s.
str.local: 你的%s从主手滑落，被%s偷走。

str.id: %s's %s slips and is stolen by you
str.value: %s's %s slips and is stolen by you

str.id: The %s has no effect on you.
str.value: The %s has no effect on you.

str.id: The potion has no effect on you.
str.value: The potion has no effect on you.
str.local: 这瓶药剂对你不起效果。

str.id: Your %s is refreshed by the potion.
str.value: Your %s is refreshed by the potion.

str.id: %s didn't seem to have any effect.
str.value: %s didn't seem to have any effect.

str.id: %s radiates a divine light for a moment.
str.value: %s radiates a divine light for a moment.

str.id: You buy %s for a gold coin.
str.value: You buy %s for a gold coin.

str.local: 你买了%s，花掉你 %d 枚金币。

str.id: You can't afford to buy those %s.
str.value: You can't afford to buy those %s.

str.id: You don't have enough materials to craft %s.
str.value: You don't have enough materials to craft %s.
str.local: 你没有足够的材料制造%s。

str.id: You don't have enough free space for those %s.
str.value: You don't have enough free space for those %s.
str.local: 你没有足够的空间存放那些%s。

str.id: You don't have enough free space for %s.
str.value: You don't have enough free space for %s.
str.local: 你没有足够的空间存放%s。

str.id: You can't place those those %s there.
str.value: You can't place those those %s there.
str.local: 你无法将那些%s放在那里。
每回合治疗 D6 点。

str.value: Spaulders increase your base chance to resist a critical hit disarm effect by 40%.
str.local: 护肩能提高你对暴击造成缴械效果 的免疫机会 40% 。

str.value: Vambraces force the system to re-roll the disarm check if you are disarmed by a critical hit.
str.local: 护腕能在你被暴击后将被缴械前重 投一次缴械检定骰。

str.value: Gloves cause your disarmed weapon to be placed in your inventory instead of the ground.
str.local: 手套能在你被缴械后让武器进入你 的物品栏而不是掉落在地上。

str.value: Boots force the system to attempt a sidestep if a knockback would push you into a chasm or trap.
str.local: 靴子能在你被击退到峡谷或陷阱前 改为一次侧移。

str.value: Primarily used by people who have strangulation fantasies, but they do occasionally work for others too.
str.local: 主要供幻想绞勒脖子的人使用，不 过偶尔也有一些其它的用途。

str.value: Teaches a spell that creates a shield around yourself.
str.local: 教会你一个法术，该法术能制造一 个护盾环绕你的四周。

str.value: Suffocates the wearer over time. This amulet cannot be unequipped.
str.local: 久而久之会使佩戴者窒息。这个项 链无法取下来。

str.value: Teaches a spell that conjures daemons out of thin air.
str.local: 教会你一个法术，该法术能凭空变 出恶魔。

str.value: Teaches a spell that identifies magical properties of an item.
str.local: 教会你一个法术，该法术能鉴定物 品的魔法特性。

str.value: Teaches a spell that enchants an item with magical properties.
str.local: 教会你一个法术，该法术能给物品 附魔。

str.value: Teaches an orb spell that causes a moderate elemental explosion.
str.local: 教会你一个法术，该法术能发出一 个法术球，制造一起适中的元素爆 炸。

str.value: Exhausts the wearer over time. This amulet cannot be unequipped.
str.local: 久而久之会使佩戴者筋疲力尽。这 个项链无法取下来。
获得火焰效果的免疫力。

str.value: Grants a haste effect and immunity against slow effects.
str.local: 获得一个加速效果，并免疫迟缓效 果。
获得冰霜效果的免疫力。

str.value: Ethereal: Halves physical, poison and disease damage but doubles magical and elemental damage taken.
str.local: 超凡：让物理，毒害和疾病效果减 半，但会使魔法和元素伤害加倍。

str.value: Teaches a spell that creates a clone of another creature.
str.local: 教会你一个法术，该法术能创造一 个生物的克隆体。

str.value: Teaches a spell that turns dead humans into undead familiars.
str.local: 教会你一个法术，该法术能将死去 的人类转变为亡灵伙伴。

str.value: Restores the wearer to full health and energy upon death... (sometimes)
str.local: 当佩戴者死亡时生命和精力恢复满 ……（有时）

str.value: Oh my G'awd... they killed Ken'nih. You bastards!
str.local: 哦，我的天呐……他们杀了肯'尼斯。 你个婊子养的！
获得眩晕效果的免疫力。

str.value: Reflects weapon and orb spell damage back at the attacker... (sometimes)
str.local: 将武器和法术球的伤害反弹给攻击 者……（有时）

str.value: Allows the wearer to automatically pick locks and moving no longer breaks stealth.
str.local: 允许佩戴者自动开锁，移动不再打 断潜行。
获得震击效果的免疫力。

str.value: Turns the wearer to stone over time. This amulet cannot be unequipped.
str.local: 久而久之会使佩戴者石化。这个项 链无法取下来。

str.value: Teaches a spell that transmutes an item into gold coins.
str.local: 教会你一个法术，该法术能将物品 变为金币。

str.value: Adorable piece of jewelry, contains no magical powers though.
str.local: 可爱的首饰，然而没有魔法效果。

str.value: Ignores negative effects to spellcasting while wearing armour and or shield.
str.local: 穿盔甲或盾牌时忽略它们对施法的 负面影响。

str.value: Every point of damage you cause has a 17% chance to charm the target for 1 turn.
str.local: 你造成的每点伤害都有 17% 的机会 魅惑目标一个回合。

str.value: Teaches a spell that allows you to alter the terrain height from chasms to walls.
str.local: 教会你一个法术，该法术可以改变 地形，把裂谷变为墙壁。

str.value: Gives you an aura with a radius of 1. Auras also make you immune to their effects.
str.local: 给你一个半径为 1 的光环。同时能 让你免疫光环效果。

str.value: This must be equipped in order to sacrifice something using a sacrificial circle and a ritual.
str.local: 在使用献祭圈进行献祭仪式时必须 佩戴它。

str.value: Every point of damage you receive has a 17% chance to charm you for 1 turn. This amulet cannot be unequipped.
str.local: 你受到的每一点伤害都有 17% 的机 会被魅惑。这个项链无法取下来。

str.value: Travel button now works after clearing 50% of the current level.
str.local: 旅行按钮现在在清空 50% 的楼层后 就可以使用。

str.value: Teaches a spell that causes magic damage or instantly kills the target creature.
str.local: 教会你一个法术，该法术可制造魔 法伤害或立即杀死目标。

str.value: Adorable piece of jewelry that seems to contain some magical powers as well.
str.local: 可爱的首饰，同时里面似乎有一些 魔法力量。

str.value: Grants one free action and immunity against slow effects.
str.local: 获得一次免费行动，免疫迟缓效果 。

str.value: Ethereal: Halves physical, poison and disease damage taken.
str.local: 超凡：让物理，毒害和疾病效果减 半。

str.value: Ignores negative effects to spellcasting and dodging while wearing armour and or shield.
str.local: 穿盔甲或盾牌时忽略它们对施法和 闪避的负面影响。

str.value: Every point of damage you cause has a 33% chance to charm the target for 1 turn.
str.local: 你造成的每点伤害都有 33% 的机会 魅惑目标一个回合。

str.value: Gives you an aura with a radius of 2. Auras also make you immune to their effects.
str.local: 给你一个半径为 2 的光环。同时能 让你免疫光环效果。

str.value: This must be in your possession in order to sacrifice something using a sacrificial circle and a ritual.
str.local: 在使用献祭圈进行献祭仪式时必须 拥有它。

str.value: Travel button now works after clearing 25% of the current level.
str.local: 旅行按钮现在在清空 25% 的楼层后 就可以使用。

str.value: Note that wearing an armour may hinder spellcasting, dodging, climbing and or jumping.
str.local: 注意：穿戴护甲有可能妨碍施法、 闪避、攀爬、跳跃。

str.value: Note that wearing a helmet may hinder spellcasting, dodging, climbing and or jumping.
str.local: 注意：穿戴头盔有可能妨碍施法、 闪避、攀爬、跳跃。

str.value: If the creatures weren't anosmic, they would die when you enter the level.
str.local: 你下到地牢时，所有有嗅觉的生物 都会被熏死。

str.value: This hood feels as if it were part of your head and detached at the same time.
str.local: 这块头巾摸上去感觉像是你脑袋的 一部分，又似乎不存在。

str.value: Even these simple sticks can hurt you if they are propelled by enough force.
str.local: 即使是这些简单的树棍，如果被足 够的力推动，也能伤害你。

str.value: The bowman's recipe of win: head, shaft and fletching propelled by enough force.
str.local: 弓箭手的制胜秘诀：箭头、箭杆和 尾羽，被足够的推力。

str.value: The sinister colour on these makes them more powerful than ordinary arrows.
str.local: 这些箭上的邪恶色彩使它们比普通 箭更有威力。

str.value: The crossbowman's recipe of win: take a bolt and use more than enough force.
str.local: 弩手的制胜秘诀：箭头上弦，然后 使用足够大的推力。

str.value: The sinister colour on these makes them more powerful than ordinary bolts.
str.local: 这些箭头上的邪恶色彩使它们比普 通箭头更有威力。

str.value: All of the tears shed by knabs makes these arrows lighter than a feather.
str.local: Knab 的眼泪让这些羽箭轻如鸿毛。

str.value: The house always wins, the sooner you realise that the better.
str.local: 庄家永远赢，越早意识到这点越好 。

str.value: This hare was privileged enough to limp away with the rest of its white limbs.
str.local: 这只野兔幸运的用剩下的腿跛着跑 掉了。

str.value: If this is just a fragment, you wonder how hot the real thing would be.
str.local: 如果这仅仅是块碎片，你很难想象 那个东西该有多滚烫。

str.value: If this is just a fragment, you wonder how cold the real thing would be.
str.local: 如果这仅仅是块碎片，你很难想象 那个东西该有多冰冷。

str.value: If this is just a fragment, you wonder how windy the real thing would be.
str.local: 如果这仅仅是块碎片，你很难想象 那个东西该有多大风。

str.value: If this is just a fragment, you wonder how tough the real thing would be.
str.local: 如果这仅仅是块碎片，你很难想象 那个东西该有多坚硬。

str.value: No monsters were hurt while making this eye. It happened during the removal.
str.local: 制造这只眼的时候没有巨怪受伤。 那发生在摘除的时候。

str.value: This tear was collected just before a young girl lost her innocence to a horde of savage raiders.
str.local: 这些眼泪是在一个小女孩被一群野 蛮的游牧者强暴的时候收集起来的 。

str.value: The owner of this egg has to settle for one kingdom instead of seven.
str.local: 这枚蛋的主人必须满足于一个王国 ，而不能是七个。

str.value: This ticker just keeps on going. Perhaps it has some magic powers.
str.local: 这只东西一直在动。也许它有一些 魔力。

str.value: A gentleman bunny or hairy hands on the cover would've been too much, right?
str.local: 封面上如果画个长发蒙面的白衣少 女就太多余了，对吗？

str.value: So this is how you make items and game mechanics obsolete as time goes by.
str.local: 没错，这里记载着物品和游戏机制 是怎么随着时间流逝而过时的。

str.value: This turns any bow into an assault bow. Remember to shout out the name of your deity before mowing infidels.
str.local: 这将把任何弓变成突击弓。记得在 收割异教徒之前喊出你的神的名字 。

str.value: They say that Lyrion Bannister finally lost his mojo and the dwarves were no more. So sad.
str.local: 他们说兰利昂·提尼斯特最终失去 了魔力，矮人再也不会有了。好难 过。

str.value: If this was black, the moon worshiping sand people would dance around it.
str.local: 如果这曾是黑色的，拜月神教的人 们会围着它跳舞。

str.value: Perhaps the 2020 written on the cap means that you win bigly.
str.local: 也许帽子上写的 2020 意味着你赢 得了巨大的胜利。

str.value: Projects a terrible force when 'Kameha..', uhm, 'Ei' is spoken out loud.
str.local: 当你喊出 'Kameha..', 嗯, 'Ei' 时会施放可怕的力量。

str.value: It reads 'Tafsa inte' in demonic, which roughly means 'Don't touch me' in common.
str.local: 用恶魔语写着 'Tafsa inte' ，通 常是 '不要碰我' 的意思。

str.value: Debt is wealth that you never have to pay back. You should start accumulating now...
str.local: 债务是你永远不需要偿还的财富。 你现在就应该开始积累……

str.value: Isn't it weird that a ghoul tooth coin is the most powerful item in the game?
str.local: 这是不是很奇怪，一枚食尸鬼牙齿 的硬币是游戏中最强大的物品？

str.value: Rubber will be invented in about a 1000 years. Until then, sinews and intestines will have to do.
str.local: 橡胶将在大约一千年后被发明出来 。在那之前，必须用肌腱和肠子来 做。

str.value: Anyone else get a scary, scarab-y, -ey, uhh whatever, feeling about this?
str.local: 有人怕，怕，怕这个吗？不管这样 ，你觉得怎样？

str.value: Clip-clop, clip-clop, Uberlyft needs its missing shoe to make you pop.
str.local: 嘀嘀，嘀嘀，优步需要它的鞋子带 你走。

str.value: The face of cultural appropriation panda when it got lei'd and someone said 'Aloha! Snackbar?'.
str.local: 这张脸过去是对熊猫形象的文化挪 用，有人看到就喊 '看！那是家快 餐店吗？'。

str.value: These things would work if all the keys would match only one lock but when all keys match every lock...
str.local: 如果一把钥匙开一把锁的话，这些 东西可能能行。可是每把钥匙都能 开任意一把锁……

str.value: Think about a tight weapon chain. Either your hand is ripped off or the chain limits your reach.
str.local: 想象一个很紧的武器链，要么你的 手被扯掉了，要么是链子妨碍你去 取。

str.value: Wow. An unconfortably large earring in a game where there is no earring slot to equip it. Awesome.
str.local: 哇喔。游戏里有这么一个超大的耳 环，但却没有耳环槽来装备它。太 棒了。

str.value: Oh well, this was one of those things that were never intended to be added but here we are.
str.local: 好吧，我本来永远都不想加这个东 西的，不过现在有了。

str.value: This horn wasn't able to avoid a busload of fairies that were offended by its toxic masculinity.
str.local: 这个牛角散发出的直男癌气息无可 避免的会招来一车皮深受其害的小 仙女。

str.value: This symbolizes the abyssal ways of clipping tips and tops of things that protrude too much.
str.local: 这象征着以深渊的方式裁剪掉多余 的东西突出重点。

str.value: All physical damage you deal to enemies also bleeds gold coins.
str.local: 在你对敌人造成物理伤害的同时撒 出金币。
获得针对眩晕效果的免疫力。

str.value: Doubles the effect of fire damage enchants on weapons.
str.local: 将附魔在武器上的火焰伤害加倍。

str.value: Doubles the effect of frost damage enchants on weapons.
str.local: 将附魔在武器上的冰霜伤害加倍。

str.value: Doubles the effect of shock damage enchants on weapons.
str.local: 将附魔在武器上的震击伤害加倍。

str.value: Increases minimum and maximum block modifier by 1.
str.local: 将最小及最大格挡修正增加一点。

str.value: You appear to be twice as far than you actually are (at least when calculating range modifiers).
str.local: 你看起来在你实际所在之处的两倍 远（至少在计算远程修正时）。

str.value: Increases max cast modifier of Celestial spells by 1.
str.local: 将天使系法术的施法修正增加一点 。

str.value: Increases max cast modifier of Draconic spells by 1.
str.local: 将龙系法术的施法修正增加一点。

str.value: Increases max cast modifier of Infernal spells by 1.
str.local: 将地狱系法术的施法修正增加一点 。

str.value: Every turn spent resting with this book makes you forget a random knowledge.
str.local: 带着这本书每休息一个回合就会随 机忘记一个知识。

str.value: All items are automatically identified when they are picked up.
str.local: 所有的物品在拾起时就会被自动鉴 定。

str.value: Doubles the maximum stack size of bolts and arrows.
str.local: 把箭囊的最大容量翻倍。

str.value: Use this demonic appendage with a blessed ring to permanently bind the ring's power on it.
str.local: 把一个被祝福的戒指和它恶魔附体 ，可以永远的把该戒指的力量绑定 在其上。

str.value: Reduces the cooldown of Arcane spells by 50%.
str.local: 将奥术的冷却时间减少一半。

str.value: Sadly, all this cap does is that it enrages demonrats when they see a person carrying one.
str.local: 可悲的是，这顶帽子唯一能做的就 是让戴着它的人激怒魔鼠。

str.value: Increases physical damage by 50% against daemons.
str.local: 针对恶魔增加 50% 物理伤害。

str.value: Daemons must pass a mental check in order to attack you.
str.local: 恶魔每次攻击你前必须通过一次精 神检定。

str.value: You can enchant items for free, at least until credits run out.
str.local: 你可以免费附魔物品，直到你的信 用耗尽。

str.value: You can say 'Molar Varghulis' for dramatic effect when you throw this at your enemy.
str.local: 当你把这个扔向敌人的同时说出“凡 人皆有一死”会有奇妙的效果。

str.value: Increases the maximum range of thrown rocks by 60% and converts their damage type to magical.
str.local: 将投掷岩石的最大范围提升 60% ， 并将伤害转换为魔法伤害。

str.value: Shoots a bolt back at the attacker when you parry an attack.
str.local: 每次你招架一次攻击时，就向攻击 者射出一支小箭。

str.value: Travel button works in town now and it takes you back to where you left.
str.local: 旅行按钮现在在城里也可以用了， 它能把你带回你离开的地方。

str.value: Allows you to see health bars on all visible creatures.
str.local: 允许你看到所有可见生物的生命条 。

str.value: When you pick a locked chest, a critical success adds blessed loot in the chest.
str.local: 当你去开一个锁上的箱子时，一次 成功暴击会增加被祝福的拾取品。
获得针对缴械效果的免疫力。

str.value: You can use this earring to make the game consider all turns as either even or odd.
str.local: 你可以用这个耳环把游戏的所有回 合都视为奇数或偶数。

str.value: Water chasms can now be used to catch fish.
str.local: 水峡谷现在可以用来钓鱼。

str.value: Allows apprentice wizards to learn and cast Bestial spells (learning also requires that you levitate).
str.local: 允许巫师学徒学习和施放兽性法术 （学习时需要浮空）。

str.value: Allows apprentice wizards to learn and cast Abyssal spells (learning also requires black soul gems).
str.local: 允许巫师学徒学习和施放深渊法术 （学习时需要有黑色魂晶）。

str.value: Any drake attempting to attack you becomes your friend permanently.
str.local: 任何企图攻击你的龙都会永久变成 你的伙伴。

str.value: Summons a loot hoarder at the first level of every random dungeon.
str.local: 在每个随机地牢的第一层召唤一个 收藏家。

str.value: There is a total of %d gold coins in your backpack and %d gold coins in the Artisans' Guild vault.
str.local: 你的背包中共有 %d 枚金币，还有 %d 枚金币存放在工匠工坊中。

str.value: There is a total of %d gold coins in your backpack.
str.local: 你在背包中共有 %d 枚金币。

str.value: Some people have become sick after eating raw meat.
str.local: 有些人吃生肉后生病了。

str.value: Fried meat is much safer to eat than raw meat.
Some people have become sick after eating raw ribs.
str.local: 有些人生吃了排骨后就生病了。

str.value: Fried ribs are much safer to eat than raw ribs.
str.local: 烤排骨比生排骨更安全。

str.value: Some people have become sick after eating raw fish.
str.local: 有些人吃生鱼片后生病了。

str.value: Fried fish is much safer to eat than raw fish.
str.local: 烤鱼比生鱼片吃起来安全多了。

str.value: Some people have become sick after eating raw chicken.
str.local: 有些人生吃了鸡肉后就生病了。

str.value: Fried chicken is much safer to eat than raw chicken.
str.local: 吃炸鸡比吃生鸡肉安全的多。

str.value: Blood caps are said to have bad blood in them.
Frying supposedly removes the bad blood from blood caps.
str.local: 火烤可以去除血蘑菇中的有害成分 。

str.value: Tastes a bit dull but keeps the hunger away.
str.local: 食之无味，但能驱走饥饿感。

str.value: This wedge smells like a peasant girl's armpit.
str.local: 这块楔子闻起来像个村姑的腋窝。

str.value: Some people have become sick after eating a raw egg.
str.local: 有些人吃了生鸡蛋后就生病了。

str.value: Fried egg is much safer to eat than a raw egg.
Boy, apple, arrow, miss, shovel, dig, forget.
str.local: 你是我的小啊小…… 哦，侵权了。

str.value: What's up du... uhh, copyright infringement.
str.local: 不是每一只兔子都爱吃胡萝卜的。

str.value: Imagine that all women look like pears. Blaaarrgghh.
str.local: 想象一下，所有的女人看起来都像 个梨。哈哈。

str.value: If you are late you must ketchup. I'll get my coat.
str.local: 如果你迟到了，你必须涂番茄酱。 我去拿外套。

str.value: This must be the synonym for gangrenous nut sack.
str.local: 这一定是腐烂坚果袋的同义词。

str.value: Stick it with a pin and somewhere someone dies.
str.local: 用针扎进去，某处的某个人就会死 。

str.value: If you weren't so sweet, we wouldn't be in this jam.
str.local: 要不是你这么体贴，我们就不会陷 入这种困境了。

str.value: Popping these cherries do not lock you up.
str.local: 吃这些樱桃不会把你关起来。

str.value: Grapevines exist only because winevines sound silly.
These things are responsible for global warming.
str.local: 这些都是全球变暖的原因。

str.value: 'Tis a shame you can't cook these into salted chips.
str.local: 真可惜你不能把这些炸成薯条.

str.value: There lives a small squirrel in every one of us.
str.local: 我们每个人体内都住着一只小松鼠 。

str.value: Tastes great if you like to pretend that you are a goat.
str.local: 如果你喜欢假装自己是一只山羊， 味道会很棒。

str.value: Perhaps vampires will be added in the game at some point.
str.local: 也许以后会在游戏里加入吸血鬼。

str.value: Even the worst axe murderer becomes a cry baby when you slice this.
str.local: 当你切这个的时候，即使是最坏的 连环杀人犯也会哭。

str.value: Can be eaten but they can also clean porcelain toilets.
str.local: 可以吃，但也可以用于清洁厕所的 瓷砖。

str.value: These are mild peppers that do not cause Bloody Flux.
str.local: 这些是温和的胡椒，不会引起血瘟 。

str.value: A dungeon dweller's food ration is a poor man's feast.
str.local: 一份地牢快餐是穷人的盛宴。

str.value: Water flask makes well water taste like spring water.
Beer is the only reason why hunter gatherers became farmers.
str.local: 啤酒是猎人、采集者成为农民的唯 一原因。

str.value: Fermenting honey with water turns any man into a poet.
str.local: 蜂蜜加水发酵，任何人都能成为诗 人。

str.value: Too much fermented apple juice may give you a head ache.
str.local: 太多的发酵苹果汁可能会使你头痛 。

str.value: Red or white, both are fine, tavern wench, bring me wine.
str.local: 红酒白酒无所谓，美女，给我上酒 。

str.value: Wow, alchemists have come up with a drink that doesn't remove thirst.
str.local: 哇，炼金术士发明了一种不解渴的 饮料。

str.value: Rogues that have not yet stopped breast feeding will love this.
str.local: 尚未断奶的游侠们会喜欢这个。

str.id: You take a bite from %s and it tastes strange.
str.value: You take a bite from %s and it tastes strange.
str.local: 你咬了一口%s，尝起来怪怪的。

str.id: You take a bite from %s and it tastes fresh.
str.value: You take a bite from %s and it tastes fresh.

str.id: You take a bite from %s and it tastes rotten.
str.value: You take a bite from %s and it tastes rotten.

str.id: You eat %s and it tastes strange.
str.value: You eat %s and it tastes strange.

str.id: You eat %s and it tastes fresh.
str.value: You eat %s and it tastes fresh.

str.id: You eat %s and it tastes rotten.
str.value: You eat %s and it tastes rotten.

str.id: You take a sip from %s and it tastes strange.
str.value: You take a sip from %s and it tastes strange.
str.local: 你抿了一小口%s，味道怪怪的。

str.id: You take a sip from %s and it tastes fresh.
str.value: You take a sip from %s and it tastes fresh.

str.id: You take a sip from %s and it tastes rotten.
str.value: You take a sip from %s and it tastes rotten.

str.id: You drink %s and it tastes strange.
str.value: You drink %s and it tastes strange.

str.id: You drink %s and it tastes fresh.
str.value: You drink %s and it tastes fresh.

str.id: You drink %s and it tastes rotten.
str.value: You drink %s and it tastes rotten.

str.id: You pour water on yourself and douse the fire.
str.value: You pour water on yourself and douse the fire.
str.local: 你把水倒在自己身上，把火浇灭。

str.id: You pour water on yourself and weaken the fire.
str.value: You pour water on yourself and weaken the fire.
str.local: 你把水倒在自己身上，火势减弱。

str.id: You feel a burning stomach ache and your bowel hurts.
str.value: You feel a burning stomach ache and your bowel hurts.
str.local: 你感到肚子一阵绞痛，肠胃受伤。

str.value: Remember that most potions are made by mixing mucus and excrements of some unspecified animal.
str.local: 记住，大多数药剂是由一些不明动 物的粘液和排泄物混合而成的。

str.value: Contains a mixture that smells and tastes bad enough to cure poisons and diseases.
str.local: 里面是一种混合物，气味和味道都 很糟糕，但可以解毒祛病。

str.value: Contains a lovely tonic that causes your pupils to dilate beyond normal range.
str.local: 里面是一种可爱的滋补品，使您的 瞳孔扩大超出正常范围。

str.value: Contains blinding poison. How and where it is made remains a mystery though.
str.local: 里面是一种致盲的毒药。它从何而 来，怎样制造的仍然是个谜。

str.value: Contains a vitriolic and oily substance that burns your skin when touched.
str.local: 里面是一种硫酸和油性物质，皮肤 触碰到会被灼伤。

str.value: Contains charming poison. How and where it is made remains a mystery though.
str.local: 里面是一种迷人的毒药。它从何而 来，怎样制造的仍然是个谜。

str.value: Contains confusing poison. How and where it is made remains a mystery though.
str.local: 里面是混乱毒药。它从何而来，怎 样制造的仍然是个谜。

str.value: Contains deafening poison. How and where it is made remains a mystery though.
str.local: 里面是致聋毒药。它从何而来，怎 样制造的仍然是个谜。

str.value: Contains deadly poison. How and where it is made remains a mystery though.
str.local: 里面是死亡毒药。它从何而来，怎 样制造的仍然是个谜。

str.value: Contains draining poison. How and where it is made remains a mystery though.
str.local: 里面是噬精毒药。它从何而来，怎 样制造的仍然是个谜。

str.value: Contains a pleasant extract made from stimulating Erythroxylum leaves.
str.local: 里面是一种从古柯叶总提取出来的 刺激性物质，能令人愉快。

str.value: Contains a sweet sparkling soft drink that is made exclusively from vegetable extracts.
str.local: 里面是一种甜的起泡软饮料，完全 由植物提取物制成。

str.value: Contains water but for some reason it does not quench thirst if drunk, go figure.
str.local: 里面含有水分，但由于某些原因， 它不解渴。如果喝了，猜猜看吧。

str.value: Contains a strong and salty alcoholic beverage that supposedly expands your mind.
str.local: 里面是一种非常咸的酒精饮料，据 说可以开阔你的思维。

str.value: Contains leeching poison. How and where it is made remains a mystery though.
str.local: 里面是吸血毒药。它从何而来，怎 样制造的仍然是个谜。

str.value: Contains just another pink fluid that teaches why we don't need no education.
str.local: 里面是另一种粉色液体，它能告诉 我们为什么不需要教育。

str.value: Contains paralytic poison. How and where it is made remains a mystery though.
str.local: 里面是麻痹毒药。它从何而来，怎 样制造的仍然是个谜。

str.value: Contains infected animal excrements that are known to cause various diseases.
str.local: 里面有携带瘟疫的动物粪便，可引 起多种疾病。

str.value: Contains silencing poison. How and where it is made remains a mystery though.
str.local: 里面是沉默毒药。它从何而来，怎 样制造的仍然是个谜。

str.value: Contains sleeping poison. How and where it is made remains a mystery though.
str.local: 里面是沉睡毒药。它从何而来，怎 样制造的仍然是个谜。

str.value: Contains slowing poison. How and where it is made remains a mystery though.
str.local: 里面是迟缓毒药。它从何而来，怎 样制造的仍然是个谜。

str.value: Contains dead bull juice that makes you so fast that it feels like having wings.
str.local: 里面是死牛汁，它可以让你跑得飞 快，感觉就像长了翅膀。

str.value: Contains the most appalling liquid you have ever seen (not counting your own snot).
str.local: 里面是你所见过的最可怕的液体（ 不包括你自己的鼻涕）。

str.value: Contains the power extracted from a single hair of Putimir 'the Bear' Vladin.
str.local: 里面的液体有着从“大熊”普蒂尔的 一根头发中提取出来的力量。

str.value: Contains stuff that makes you instinctively howl even when you only smell it.
str.local: 里面的液体闻一闻就会让你本能地 狼嚎。

str.value: Contains a mixture that makes you stronger than you were like a minute ago.
str.local: 里面有一种混合物，瞬间就能让你 更强壮。

str.value: Contains something that makes you smoother than a backwards walking pedophile.
str.local: 里面有一些东西，可以让你比一个 倒着走路的恋童癖者更灵活。

str.value: Contains 'Niagra', which would be awesome if there were any action available.
str.local: 里面是“尼亚加拉”，如果能用它做 点什么就太棒了。

str.value: Contains anti-wrinkle ointment that probably should be applied on your skin.
str.local: 里面是抗皱软膏，可能应该能用在 你的皮肤上。

str.value: Contains slightly poisonous mixture that stops you from bleeding.
str.local: 里面是一种轻微的有毒混合物，可 以防止出血。

str.value: Contains floater blood that makes you levitate.
str.local: 里面是浮游类的血，可以让你浮空 。
你喝了一瓶未知的药剂。

str.id: The potion breaks and its contents splash on %s.
str.value: The potion breaks and its contents splash on %s.
str.local: 药瓶破碎了，里面的液体溅到%s身上。

str.value: In addition to being signs of spousal servitude, some rings can provide incredibly powerful effects.
str.local: 除了用于标示已成为配偶的奴隶， 有些戒指还能提供一些强力效果。

str.value: Another ring to rule them all. This one is now your precious!
str.local: 另一个统治世界的戒指。这是你的 最爱！

str.value: Allows the wearer to re-roll misses with ranged and thrown weapons.
str.local: 允许佩戴者在远程武器和投掷武器 射失时重掷命中骰。

str.value: Looks impressive but contains no magical powers.
str.local: 看起来令人印象深刻，但没有魔法 力量。

str.value: Allows the wearer to re-roll misses with melee weapons.
str.local: 允许佩戴者在近战武器击空后重掷 命中骰。

str.value: Grants immunity against blind, deafen and silence effects.
str.local: 获得对盲眼，耳聋，沉默效果的免 疫力。

str.value: Grants immunity against charm, confuse and paralyse effects.
str.local: 获得对魅惑，混乱，麻痹效果的免 疫力。

str.value: Doubles the wearer's parry modifier. This effect does not stack.
str.local: 加倍佩戴者的招架修正。这个效果 无法叠加。

str.value: Grants immunity against fire, frost and shock effects.
str.local: 获得对火焰，冰霜，震击效果的免 疫力。

str.value: Increases either block, dodge or parry modifier by 1. This effect does not stack.
str.local: 将格挡，闪避或招架修正之一加 1 。这个效果无法叠加。

str.value: Summons and controls a whelp when equipped. This ring is destroyed if the whelp dies.
str.local: 装备时召唤并控制一只幼龙。当幼 龙死亡时，戒指也会同时摧毁。

str.value: Grants immunity against sleep and fear effects.
str.local: 获得对沉睡和恐惧效果的免疫力。

str.value: Grants immunity against slow, knockback and polymorph effects.
str.local: 获得对迟缓，击退，变形效果的免 疫力。

str.value: Forces the wearer to re-roll ranged hits. This ring cannot be unequipped.
str.local: 强制佩戴者在远程命中后重掷命中 骰。这枚戒指无法取下。

str.value: Grants a haste effect at the expense of doubling the food and water consumption rates.
str.local: 获得一个加速效果，但食物和水的 消耗速度加倍。

str.value: Triples food consumption rate. This ring cannot be unequipped.
str.local: 三倍食物消耗速度。这枚戒指无法 取下。

str.value: Grants immunity against poison, disease and curse effects.
str.local: 获得对毒害，疾病和诅咒效果的免 疫力。

str.value: May contain up to three different enchants instead of one.
str.local: 可以附魔三次而不是一次。

str.value: Allows the wearer to re-roll failed energy regeneration checks and makes him vulnerable to fire.
str.local: 允许佩戴者在精力回复检定失败后 重掷，同时会使他更容易着火。

str.value: Grants immunity against leech, drain and instant death effects.
str.local: 获得对吸血，噬精和即死效果的免 疫力。

str.value: Automatically identifies scrolls and tomes when they are picked up.
str.local: 在拾取卷轴和典籍的同时鉴定它们 。

str.value: Grants a free search action and allows the wielder to re-roll failed search checks. This effect does not stack.
str.local: 获得一次免费的搜索行动，同时允 许佩戴者在搜索检定失败后重掷。 这个效果无法叠加。

str.value: Ignores food and water consumption on either even or odd game turns (main hand or offhand).
str.local: 在奇数或偶数回合（主手或副手） 忽略食物和水的消耗。

str.value: Triples water consumption rate. This ring cannot be unequipped.
str.local: 三倍水消耗速度。这枚戒指无法取 下。

str.value: Makes you vulnerable to all damage. This ring cannot be unequipped.
str.local: 使你更容易受任何性质的伤害。这 枚戒指无法取下。

str.value: Heals you for 20% of the physical weapon damage you cause.
str.local: 治疗你相当于 20% 你造成的物理伤 害。

str.value: Converts all weapon damage you receive into physical damage and reduces it by 10%.
str.local: 把所有你受到的伤害减少 10% 并转 换为物理伤害。

str.value: Increases physical damage by 20% with melee and ranged weapons.
str.local: 近战和远程武器的物理伤害增加 2 0% 。

str.value: Halves experience gained. This effect does not stack.
str.local: 获得的经验减半。这个效果无法叠 加。

str.value: Hides you in plain sight when you take damage.
str.local: 在你受到伤害时将你凭空藏匿。

str.value: Each point of energy counts as 3 points of health. This effect does not stack.
str.local: 每点精力计为三点生命。这个效果 无法叠加。

str.value: Increases all resistances by up to 5, the lower your health.
str.local: 最多增加所有的抗性五点，生命越 低增加越多。

str.value: Another ring to rule them all. This one also makes you invisible and it is now your precious!
str.local: 另一枚统治世界的戒指。这枚戒指 还可以让你隐身，它是你的最爱！

str.value: Increases either block, dodge or parry modifier by 2. This effect does not stack.
str.local: 将格挡，闪避或招架修正之一加 2 。这个效果无法叠加。

str.value: Summons and controls a drake when equipped. This ring is destroyed if the drake dies.
str.local: 在装备时召唤并控制一条龙。 当龙 死亡时，戒指也会同时摧毁。

str.value: Grants a haste effect without affecting food and water consumption rates.
str.local: 获得一个加速效果，不会增加食物 和水的消耗。

str.value: May contain up to six different enchants instead of one.
str.local: 可以附魔六次而不是一次。

str.value: Automatically identifies wands, potions, scrolls and tomes when they are picked up.
str.local: 当你拾起魔杖，药剂，卷轴，典籍 时，鉴定它们。

str.value: Completely ignores food and water consumption.
str.local: 完全忽略食物和水的消耗。

str.value: Heals you for 30% of the physical weapon damage you cause.
str.local: 治疗你相当于 30% 你造成的物理伤 害。

str.value: Converts all weapon damage you receive into physical damage and reduces it by 20%.
str.local: 把所有你受到的伤害减少 20% 并转 换为物理伤害。

str.value: Increases physical damage by 30% with melee and ranged weapons.
str.local: 近战和远程武器的物理伤害增加 3 0% 。

str.value: Quarters experience gained. This effect does not stack.
str.local: 获得的经验减少到四分之一。这个 效果无法叠加。

str.value: Hides you in plain sight and blinds the possible attacker when you take damage.
str.local: 在你受到伤害时将你凭空藏匿并致 盲攻击者。

str.value: Each point of energy counts as 5 points of health. This effect does not stack.
str.local: 每点精力计为五点生命。这个效果 无法叠加。

str.value: Increases all resistances by up to 8, the lower your health.
str.local: 最多增加所有的抗性八点，生命越 低增加越多

str.value: It's such a shame that an entire race had to die for this rune to exist.
str.local: 真是令人惭愧，因为这块符石，整 个种族都得去死。

str.value: This rune gives legendary status to a weapon making it unbreakable and allows you to name the weapon.
str.local: 这块符石能将一件武器变成传奇， 使它坚不可摧，并允许你为它命名 。

str.value: In addition to being an excellent form of kindling, scrolls can prove out to be very useful in certain situations.
str.local: 除了是一种极佳的引燃材料之外， 卷轴还能在特定处境下起到非常重 要的作用。

str.value: Aggravates all creatures in the current level.
str.local: 激怒当前楼层的所有生物。

str.value: Causes the caster to forget a random knowledge.
str.local: 让施法者随机忘却一个知识。

str.value: Permanently turns a dead human into an undead familiar.
str.local: 将一个死去的人类永久的变成一个 亡灵伙伴。

str.value: Attempts to banish all daemons within line of sight.
str.local: 尝试驱逐视野中的所有恶魔。

str.value: Removes all curse effects from the target creature, location or an item.
str.local: 移除目标生物，位置或物品上的所 有诅咒效果。

str.value: Reveals all hidden map objects to the caster.
str.local: 对施法者揭示所有隐藏的地图物品 。

str.value: Teleports the target creature to a random location.
str.local: 把目标生物传送到一个随机位置。

str.value: Removes all magical effects from the target creature, location or an item.
str.local: 移除目标生物、位置或物品上的所 有魔法效果。

str.value: Enchants an item in the caster's inventory.
str.local: 对施法者物品栏中的一件物品附魔 。

str.value: Identifies an item in the caster's inventory.
str.local: 鉴定施法者物品栏中的一件物品。

str.value: Teaches the caster a random knowledge.
str.local: 教会施法者一个随机的知识。

str.value: Turns on all light sources in the current level.
str.local: 点亮当前楼层中的所有光源。

str.value: Polymorphs the target creature into a giant rat.
str.local: 把目标生物变形为一只巨鼠。

str.value: Charges a wand in the caster's inventory.
str.local: 对施法者物品栏中的一把魔杖充能 。

str.value: Summons a daemon at the target location and enslaves it.
str.local: 在目标位置召唤一个恶魔并奴役它 。

str.value: Teleports the caster to the target location within line of sight.
str.local: 将施法者传送到视野中的指定位置 。

str.value: Attempts to turn all undead creatures within line of sight.
str.local: 尝试超度视野中的所有亡灵。

str.value: Causes the targeted mushroom patch to explode. May cause a chain reaction.
str.local: 引爆目标处的蘑菇，有可能造成连 锁反应。

str.value: Springs up a number of mushroom patches over a large area.
str.local: 在一大片区域上种下蘑菇。

str.value: Summons a snake pit and possibly some snakes around it.
str.local: 召唤一个蛇坑，可能还会有一些蛇 围绕着它。

str.value: Summons up to 6 mirror images and hides you in plain sight.
str.local: 召唤最多 6 个镜像，让你凭空藏匿 。

str.value: Captures the target in a spider web and summons some spiders.
str.local: 用蜘蛛网捕获目标，并召唤一些蜘 蛛。

str.value: Stops you from bleeding and applies a renewing touch effect.
str.local: 给你止血并施加一个回复之触效果 。

str.value: Causes the targeted mushroom patch to spawn a treeman. May cause a chain reaction.
str.local: 让目标蘑菇长成一个树人。可能产 生连锁反应。

str.value: Disarms the target by equipping its main hand weapon in your empty thieving leprachaun hands.
str.local: 将目标装备在主手的武器缴械到你 的空手中。

str.value: Soothes all beasts within line of sight.
str.local: 抚慰视野中的所有野兽。

str.value: Cancels your current quest and returns you to town, allowing you to try it again later.
str.local: 取消你当前的任务并返回城镇，允 许你以后再此尝试。

str.id: You feel less threatened for some reason.
str.value: You feel less threatened for some reason.
str.local: 因为某种原因，你感觉威胁减少了。

str.id: You feel that you have upset your friends and made new enemies.
str.value: You feel that you have upset your friends and made new enemies.
str.local: 你感觉惹恼了你的伙伴，你又有了新的敌人。

str.id: You feel that you have made new enemies.
str.value: You feel that you have made new enemies.

str.id: You feel that you have upset your friends.
str.value: You feel that you have upset your friends.
str.local: 你感觉惹恼了你的伙伴。

str.id: You feel daemon blood in your veins.
str.value: You feel daemon blood in your veins.
str.local: 你感觉你的体内流淌着恶魔之血。

str.id: You feel that everything is hidden.
str.value: You feel that everything is hidden.

str.id: You feel that nothing is hidden anymore.
str.value: You feel that nothing is hidden anymore.

str.id: %s yells: Your trickery is useless here!
str.value: %s yells: Your trickery is useless here!
str.local: %s 喊道：你的诡计在这里是没有用的！

str.id: You suddenly feel more talented than ever.
str.value: You suddenly feel more talented than ever.
str.local: 你突然觉得自己比以前更有才华了。

str.id: The world seems somewhat stranger now.
str.value: The world seems somewhat stranger now.
str.local: 现在的世界似乎有些陌生。

str.id: The world seems somewhat brighter now.
str.value: The world seems somewhat brighter now.
str.local: 现在世界似乎更加光明了。

str.id: %s shimmers brightly before shattering to pieces.
str.value: %s shimmers brightly before shattering to pieces.
str.local: %s 在破碎成碎片之前光芒四射。

str.id: %s vanishes before you teleport on it.
str.value: %s vanishes before you teleport on it.
str.local: %s 在你传送到它之前消失了。

str.id: %s appears before you teleport on it.
str.value: %s appears before you teleport on it.
str.local: %s 在你传送到它之前出现了。

str.id: You teleport to a new location.
str.value: You teleport to a new location.
str.local: 你瞬移到一个新的位置。

str.id: You feel death chill in your bones.
str.value: You feel death chill in your bones.
str.local: 你感到死一般的彻骨之寒。

str.id: You suddenly feel as if you've traveled 88 mph.
str.value: You suddenly feel as if you've traveled 88 mph.
str.local: 你瞬间感觉时速到了 88 英里。

str.id: You suddenly get a strange deja vu feeling.
str.value: You suddenly get a strange deja vu feeling.
str.local: 一种奇怪的既视感瞬间袭来。

str.value: It is very difficult to cast Draconic and Infernal spells while wielding a shield.
str.local: 在装备了盾牌后，施放龙系和地狱 系法术将变得困难。

str.value: This used to belong to Dawid the Paladin before he joined his battle brothers in the afterlife.
str.local: 这曾是圣骑士达维德生前用过的盾 牌。

str.id: Tome of Army of the Dead
str.value: Tome of Army of the Dead
You have identified that this tome is blessed and it contains the %s spell.
str.local: 你鉴定过这本典籍，它被祝福过， 上面记载着 %s 法术。

str.value: You have identified that this tome is cursed and it contains the %s spell.
str.local: 你鉴定过这本典籍，它被诅咒了， 上面记载着 %s 法术。

str.value: You have identified that this tome contains the %s spell.
str.local: 你鉴定过这本典籍，它记载着 %s 法术。

str.value: You know that this tome contains the %s spell but it's not fully identified yet.
str.local: 你知道这本典籍中记载着 %s 法术 ，但它尚未被鉴定。

str.value: You recognize the celestial symbol on the tome. You may want to identify it before reading though.
str.local: 你在典籍上认出了一个天使系符记 。不过你想可能还是应该先鉴定一 下再读。

str.value: You recognize the draconic symbol on the tome. You may want to identify it before reading though.
str.local: 你在典籍上认出了一个龙系符记。 不过你想可能还是应该先鉴定一下 再读。

str.value: You recognize the infernal symbol on the tome. You may want to identify it before reading though.
str.local: 你在典籍上认出了一个地狱系符记 。不过你想可能还是应该先鉴定一 下再读。

str.value: You recognize the arcane symbol on the tome. You may want to identify it before reading though.
str.local: 你在典籍上认出了一个奥术符记。 不过你想可能还是应该先鉴定一下 再读。

str.value: You recognize the bestial symbol on the tome. You may want to identify it before reading though.
str.local: 你在典籍上认出了一个兽性符记。 不过你想可能还是应该先鉴定一下 再读。

str.value: You recognize the abyssal symbol on the tome. You may want to identify it before reading though.
str.local: 你在典籍上认出了一个深渊符记。 不过你想可能还是应该先鉴定一下 再读。

str.value: This tome appears to be written in some unknown language.
str.local: 这本典籍看起来是用一些未知语言 撰写的。

str.id: You begin to read an unknown tome.
str.value: You begin to read an unknown tome.
str.local: 你开始阅读一本未知的典籍。

str.id: One of your black soul gems is consumed by the tome.
str.value: One of your black soul gems is consumed by the tome.
str.local: 你的一颗黑魂晶被典籍消耗掉了。

str.id: You open the tome at the bookmark and check out the nine inch males.
str.value: You open the tome at the bookmark and check out the nine inch males.
str.local: 你翻到这本典籍的书签处，查阅那个二十三厘米的男性。

str.id: You open the tome at the bookmark and check out the ladies. Ooh la la!
str.value: You open the tome at the bookmark and check out the ladies. Ooh la la!
str.local: 你翻到这本典籍的书签处，查阅那个女士。哇哦！

str.id: You finish reading the tome and learn how to cast %s.
str.value: You finish reading the tome and learn how to cast %s.
str.local: 你读完了这本典籍，学会了施放%s.

str.id: You browse through the appendix and also learn how to cast %s.
str.value: You browse through the appendix and also learn how to cast %s.
str.local: 你从附录开始阅览，也学会了施放%s。

str.id: The tome glows brightly for a second and turns to dust.
str.value: The tome glows brightly for a second and turns to dust.
str.local: 这本典籍开始发光，眨眼间变为了灰烬。

str.id: You finish reading the tome and you forget something.
str.value: You finish reading the tome and you forget something.
str.local: 你读完了这本典籍，似乎忘了什么。

str.id: You finish reading the tome and you forget how to walk straight.
str.value: You finish reading the tome and you forget how to walk straight.
str.local: 你读完了这本典籍，忘掉了怎么走直线。

str.id: You browse through the tome and look for pretty pictures.
str.value: You browse through the tome and look for pretty pictures.
str.local: 你翻阅这本典籍，想找点漂亮的图片。

str.id: Your %s shimmers brightly before shattering to pieces.
str.value: Your %s shimmers brightly before shattering to pieces.
str.local: 你的%s在破碎前闪耀着微光。

str.value: Hides you in plain sight. Prolonged use might cause lung cancer according to the sticker at the bottom.
str.local: 让你凭空藏匿。底部的标签上写着 ，长期使用可能会导致肺癌。

str.value: A trap master can arm this without losing too many fingers.
str.local: 陷阱大师可以装备它而不必失去手 指。

str.value: A trap master can arm this without getting burnt in the process.
str.local: 陷阱大师可以装备它而不会被烧焦 。

str.value: This metal seems to become firmer when touched gently.
str.local: 轻轻的触摸这块金属会让它越发的 坚固。

str.value: No animals were harmed during the skinning process.
str.local: 剥皮过程没有伤害任何动物。

str.value: This thread was first seen in the mines of Khevlar.
str.local: 这种丝最初在凯夫拉尔的矿井中发 现。

str.value: This wood really puts the angio in a spermous tree.
str.local: 这根木头是精魂之树的血脉。

str.value: One man's reusable scrap is another man's treasure.
str.local: 一个人的废品是另一个人的宝藏。

str.value: This is one of Leo Noerde's schematics and he probably wants it back.
str.local: 这是一张鲁班的图纸，他可能想要 回去。

str.value: Fits perfectly on the head of a King that wants to rule his people with an iron fist.
str.local: 对于想用铁腕统治人民的国王，它 戴起来正合适。

str.value: This collar can be used to safely store Woof while you do whatever it is that you do when you're alone.
str.local: 当你独自一人做事情的时候，这个 项圈可以用来安全地藏起汪汪。

str.value: These gems are said to contain the souls of innocent victims but in reality there is no such thing as innocent...
str.local: 这些晶石据说内含无辜受害者的灵 魂，但在现实中没有所谓的无辜……

str.value: These gems are said to contain the souls of innocent victims but this one doesn't seem all that innocent...
str.local: 这些晶石据说内含无辜受害者的灵 魂，但这个灵魂看起来并不无辜……

str.value: There's an engraving on the handle saying 'Shall not be infringed'.
str.local: 手柄上刻着“不可侵犯”的字样。

str.value: There appears to be inscription on the wand that is written in some unknown language.
str.local: 魔杖上看起来被刻下了某种未知的 语言。

str.value: The inscription on the wand says "Point and click". Imagine if you would have to learn how to read for this?!?
str.local: 魔杖上的刻痕说「指向和点击」。 想象一下如果你不得不学习如何阅 读这段的话?!?

str.value: Shoots an amplified and enlarged frozen orb at the target location.
str.local: 向目标地点发射一颗不断扩张和放 大的冰球。

str.value: Shoots a flaming stream at the target location hitting everyone on the path.
str.local: 向目标地点发射一条燃烧的热浪， 对路径上的所有单位造成伤害。

str.value: Allows the caster to channel a known spell through the wand.
str.local: 允许施法者通过魔杖通导一个已知 的法术。

str.value: Shoots a frozen stream at the target location hitting everyone on the path.
str.local: 向目标地点发射一条冰冻的寒流， 对路径上的所有单位造成伤害。

str.value: Creates a cloud of corruption at the target location hitting everyone inside.
str.local: 在目标地点制造一团腐败之云，对 覆盖范围内的所有单位造成伤害。

str.value: Shoots a crippling stream at the target location hitting everyone on the path.
str.local: 向目标地点发射一条毁灭的路径， 对路径上的所有单位造成伤害。

str.value: Causes a boulder to fall from the ceiling at the target location.
str.local: 向目标地点的落下巨石。

str.value: Creates a web explosion at the target location trapping everyone inside.
str.local: 在目标地点张开大网，困住覆盖范 围内的所有单位。

str.value: The creator of this wand clearly favours brains over muscles.
str.local: 这个魔杖的创造者相比于卖力气显 然更爱动脑子。

str.value: Causes frost damage or instantly kills the target creature.
str.local: 造成冰霜伤害或者立即杀死目标生 物。

str.value: Shoots an amplified and enlarged virulent orb at the target location.
str.local: 向目标地点发射一颗不断扩张和放 大的瘟疫球。

str.value: Shoots an amplified and enlarged flaming orb at the target location.
str.local: 向目标地点发射一颗不断扩张和放 大的火球。

str.value: Damages and knocks the target creature back.
str.local: 击退目标生物并且造成伤害。

str.value: Creates a death vortex at the target location hitting everyone inside.
str.local: 在目标地点制造一个死亡旋涡，对 覆盖范围内的所有单位造成伤害。

str.value: Causes fire damage or instantly kills the target creature.
str.local: 造成火焰伤害或者立即杀死目标生 物。

str.value: Shoots an amplified and enlarged venomous orb at the target location.
str.local: 向目标地点发射一颗不断扩张和放 大的毒球。

str.value: Teleports the caster to the target location.
str.local: 将施法者传送到目标地点。

str.value: Shoots an electric stream at the target location hitting everyone on the path.
str.local: 向目标地点发射一条的电流，对路 径上的所有单位造成伤害。

str.value: Shoots an amplified and enlarged electric orb at the target location.
str.local: 向目标地点发射一颗不断扩张和放 大的闪电球。

str.value: Stroke me gently and your wish might just come true.
str.local: 轻柔得抚摸我将会让你梦想成真。

str.value: The creator of this wand really likes to gamble.
str.local: 这个魔杖的创造者是个十足的赌徒 。

str.value: Causes shock damage or instantly kills the target creature.
str.local: 造成震击伤害或者立即杀死目标生 物。

str.value: Shuffles the locations of all creatures within line of sight and confuses them.
str.local: 打乱视线内所有生物的位置并使其 混乱。

str.value: Causes the target to bleed to death (in most cases).
str.local: 让目标流血至死（大多数情况下） 。

str.value: Disarms the target by dropping its main hand weapon on the floor.
str.local: 缴械目标，让它的主手武器掉落在 地板上。

str.value: Snares the target in a bear trap and summons some wolves.
str.local: 将目标困在捕熊陷阱中同时召唤狼 群。

str.value: Stuns a friend until you break the effect by swapping places.
str.local: 让一个朋友持续眩晕，除非你和他 交换位置。

str.value: Conjures a 3x3 sacrificial circle that is centered on the cursor.
str.local: 以鼠标为中心召唤出一个 3*3 的圆 形献祭魔法阵。

str.value: Creates an average quality duplicate of a scroll.
str.local: 以一般的水准复制一个卷轴。

str.value: Causes immense magical damage but never enough to kill the target.
str.local: 造成巨大的魔法伤害，但不会杀死 目标。

str.id: The wall crumbles and reveals a hidden door.
str.value: The wall crumbles and reveals a hidden door.
str.local: 墙倒塌了，露出一扇隐藏的门。

str.id: The wall crumbles and reveals a hidden passage.
str.value: The wall crumbles and reveals a hidden passage.
str.local: 墙倒塌了，露出一条隐蔽的通道。

str.id: The wall crumbles and breaks into a boulder.
str.value: The wall crumbles and breaks into a boulder.

str.id: The floor collapses into a spiked pit.
str.value: The floor collapses into a spiked pit.
str.local: 地板塌陷成一个有尖刺的坑。

str.id: You fall down into the spiked pit.
str.value: You fall down into the spiked pit.
str.local: 你掉进了有尖刺的坑里。

str.id: %s falls down into the spiked pit.
str.value: %s falls down into the spiked pit.

str.id: You don't have room for the duplicated %s.
str.value: You don't have room for the duplicated %s.
This is a piercing weapon and as such has a chance of ignoring the target's physical resistance.
str.local: 这是一种穿刺武器，因此有可 能忽略目标的物理抗性。

str.value: This weapon is perfect against those nasty kidneys that keep coming in its way.
str.local: 这把武器用来对付那些坏蛋简 直太棒了。

str.value: This is a thrown melee weapon and as such can be both equipped and thrown for full damage.
str.local: 这是一种投掷近战武器，因此 既可以装备使用也可以仍出去 造成全部伤害。

str.value: This is a slashing weapon and as such has a good chance of doubling the base damage against weaker targets.
str.local: 这是一种砍杀武器，因此对较 弱的目标有加倍基础伤害的好 机会。

str.value: This claw feels like an extension of some kind but it actually works pretty well.
str.local: 这只爪子感觉像是某种类型的 扩展，但实际上它工作得很好 。

str.value: This weapon is great for chopping down trees and orcs which grow rampant in the dungeons.
str.local: 这种武器非常适合砍倒地牢里 猖獗兽人和树木。

str.value: This weapon should only be used as a last resort unless you're born with a green skin.
str.local: 除非你的皮肤是绿色的，否则 这种武器只能作为最后的手段 使用。

str.value: This is a crushing weapon and as such has a good chance of halving the target's physical resistance.
str.local: 这是一种粉碎性武器，因此很 有可能将目标的物理抗性减半 。

str.value: This weapon is durable and as such it allows to re-roll failed durability checks.
str.local: 这把武器非常耐用，它允许你 在耐久检定失败时重掷。

str.value: This is a flailing weapon and as such has a good chance of ignoring the target's parry or block modifiers.
str.local: 这是一把连打型武器，有更大 的可能忽略目标的招架或格挡 修正。

str.value: Tie a string on a tree branch, fletch some sticks and take over the world.
str.local: 把一根绳子系在树枝上，给树 枝装上羽毛，然后就能征服世 界。

str.value: This is a ranged weapon and as such must be equipped with the right kind of arrows in the offhand.
str.local: 这是一种远程武器，因此必须 在副手配备正确类型的羽箭。

str.value: Get a horse and call yourself a Khan. Barring that, it also works in a closed environment.
str.local: 骑上一匹马，叫自己可汗。除 此之外，室内也能工作。

str.value: This sword is perfectly balanced to keep those pesky peasants in line.
str.local: 这把剑打造的很好，能使那些 讨厌的农民守规矩。

str.value: A man who can cut down a tree with an axe can cut down a bigger tree with this.
str.local: 一个能用小斧头砍倒一棵树的 人能用这个砍倒一棵更大的树 。

str.value: Works brilliantly in situations where you must crush or be crushed.
str.local: 在你必须粉碎对方或被对方粉 碎的情况下它显得辉煌无比。

str.value: This weapon is great for knocking down obstacles such as orcs and walls.
str.local: 这把武器是在击倒障碍方面特 别出色，比如兽人和墙壁。

str.value: This weapon is a polearm and as such has a range of up to two tiles with the attack button.
str.local: 这种武器是一种长柄武器，因 此你可以通过按攻击按钮打出 两格的攻击范围。

str.value: This weapon is a conduit and as such it allows the wielder to re-roll failed spell to-hit rolls.
str.local: 这把武器是一种导器，这意味 着它允许持有者重掷失败的施 法骰和法术命中骰。

str.value: This is a slow weapon and as such must be rearmed after every time it is used.
str.local: 这是一种慢速武器，因此每次 使用后都必须重新整备。

str.value: Unlike regular crossbows, the ones on the receiving end of a repeater won't get to tell their story.
str.local: 与普通的弩不同，被连弩终结 的家伙都来不及叫出来。

str.value: This rock looks fancier and rests more fittingly in your palm than many other rocks.
str.local: 这块岩石看起来比其他石头更 漂亮，放在你的手掌上也更合 适。

str.value: This knife is perfectly balanced to stop those weaklings who try to run away.
str.local: 这把飞刀锻造的非常之好，正 好用来阻止那些弱夫逃跑。

str.value: This weapon is great for those villains who don't mind robbing their victims.
str.local: 这把武器对那些肆意抢劫的恶 棍来说太棒了。

str.value: This is a piercing weapon and as such has a chance of ignoring the target's physical resistance.
str.local: 这是一种穿刺武器，因此有可 能忽略目标的物理抗性。

str.value: This weapon is perfect against those nasty kidneys that keep coming in its way.
str.local: 这把武器用来对付那些坏蛋简 直太棒了。

str.value: This is a thrown melee weapon and as such can be both equipped and thrown for full damage.
str.local: 这是一种投掷近战武器，因此 既可以装备使用也可以仍出去 造成全部伤害。

str.value: This is a slashing weapon and as such has a good chance of doubling the base damage against weaker targets.
str.local: 这是一种砍杀武器，因此对较 弱的目标有加倍基础伤害的好 机会。

str.local: 这是一把连打型武器，有更大 的可能忽略目标的招架或格挡 修正。

str.local: 把一根绳子系在树枝上，给树 枝装上羽毛，然后就能征服世 界。

str.value: This is a ranged weapon and as such must be equipped with the right kind of arrows in the offhand.
str.local: 这是一种远程武器，因此必须 在副手配备正确类型的羽箭。

str.local: 骑上一匹马，叫自己可汗。除 此之外，室内也能工作。
