str.local: 这把剑打造的很好，能使那些 讨厌的农民守规矩。

str.value: A man who can cut down a tree with an axe can cut down a bigger tree with this.
str.local: 一个能用小斧头砍倒一棵树的 人能用这个砍倒一棵更大的树 。

str.value: Works brilliantly in situations where you must crush or be crushed.
str.local: 在你必须粉碎对方或被对方粉 碎的情况下它显得辉煌无比。

str.value: This weapon is great for knocking down obstacles such as orcs and walls.
str.local: 这把武器是在击倒障碍方面特 别出色，比如兽人和墙壁。

str.value: This weapon is a polearm and as such has a range of up to two tiles with the attack button.
str.local: 这种武器是一种长柄武器，因 此你可以通过按攻击按钮打出 两格的攻击范围。

str.value: This weapon is a conduit and as such it allows the wielder to re-roll failed spell to-hit rolls.
str.local: 这把武器是一种导器，这意味 着它允许持有者重掷失败的施 法骰和法术命中骰。

str.value: This is a slow weapon and as such must be rearmed after every time it is used.
str.local: 这是一种慢速武器，因此每次 使用后都必须重新整备。

str.value: Unlike regular crossbows, the ones on the receiving end of a repeater won't get to tell their story.
str.local: 与普通的弩不同，被连弩终结 的家伙都来不及叫出来。

str.value: This weapon teaches its wielder how to cast one of the five orb spells.
str.local: 这把武器能教会使用者如何施 放五种法术球中的一种。

str.value: This weapon teaches its wielder how to cast the Flaming Orb spell.
str.local: 这把武器能教会使用者如何施 放火球术。

str.value: This weapon teaches its wielder how to cast the Frozen Orb spell.
str.local: 这把武器能教会使用者如何施 放冰球术。

str.value: This weapon teaches its wielder how to cast the Electric Orb spell.
str.local: 这把武器能教会使用者如何施 放电球术。

str.value: This weapon teaches its wielder how to cast the Venomous Orb spell.
str.local: 这把武器能教会使用者如何施 放毒球术。

str.value: This weapon teaches its wielder how to cast the Virulent Orb spell.
str.local: 这把武器能教会使用者如何施 放疫球术。

str.value: This weapon teaches its wielder how to cast the Release Soul spell.
str.local: 这把武器能教会使用者如何施 放释放灵魂。

str.value: This knife is perfectly balanced to stop those weaklings who try to run away.
str.local: 这把飞刀锻造的非常之好，正 好用来阻止那些弱夫逃跑。

str.value: This weapon is great for those villains who don't mind robbing their victims.
str.local: 这把武器对那些肆意抢劫的恶 棍来说太棒了。

str.value: This used to belong to Master Gifin-Gif before you snatched it from his dead body.
str.local: 这曾经属于吉夫大师，你从他 的尸体上夺了过来。

str.value: This used to belong to Beartamer Gareth before you looted it from his corpse.
str.local: 这曾经属于驯熊师加雷思，你 从他的尸体上捡到的。

str.value: This used to belong to Dawid the Paladin before he joined his battle brothers in the afterlife.
str.local: 这曾经属于圣骑士达维德，他 已经随他的兄弟们战死沙场。

str.value: This is one of those toys that you get to have as a King. Enjoy while it's yours.
str.local: 这是你成为一个国王的诸多玩 具中的一个。好好把玩。

str.value: This used to belong to Ranger Satyr'Dae before you picked it up from his remains.
str.local: 这曾经属于独行侠赛特，你从 他的遗物中获得。

str.value: This used to belong to Swordmaster Logar before you took it from his cold dead hands.
str.local: 这曾经属于剑圣洛迦，他的手 已不再有体温。

str.value: This used to belong to Prince Altren and there's a carving on the stock that says XLVII, whatever that means.
str.local: 这曾经属于艾特仁王子，上面 刻有 XLVII ，已经不知道其含 义。

str.value: This used to belong to Ryan the Trickster and it teaches its wielder how to cast the Virulent Orb spell.
str.local: 这曾经属于魔术师赖安，持有 它的人可以施放瘟疫球。

str.value: This used to belong to Archmage Gyffendal and it teaches its wielder how to cast the Flaming Orb spell.
str.local: 这曾经属于大法师高焚岱，持 有它的人可以施放火球术。

str.value: This used to belong to Ice Queen Altara and it teaches its wielder how to cast the Frozen Orb spell.
str.local: 这曾经属于冰霜女王艾特娜， 持有它的人可以施放冰球术。

str.value: These throwing stars are one of the deadliest tools used by the Blackhand assassins.
str.local: 这些手里剑是黑手刺客用过的 最致命的武器。

str.value: Well, like it or not, this weapon is now extra shiny with a cool name and it's also unbreakable.
str.local: 好吧，不管你喜不喜欢，这个 武器现在有了一个很酷的名字 ，而且它是不会坏的。

str.value: This weapon can gain a legendary effect if it's equipped in the main hand while imbuement conditions are met.
str.local: 当这把武器装备在主手且满足 灌注条件时，它会获得一个传 奇效果。

str.value: Cave bears are now automatically tamed when they try to attack you.
str.local: 现在洞熊在攻击你的时候自动 被驯化。

str.value: Divine Shield is automatically cast if this effect is not on cooldown and damage taken would kill you.
str.local: 只要这个效果不在冷却状态， 当你将承受足以致死的伤害时 ，自动施放神圣之盾。

str.value: Everyone who can see this weapon at the end of their own turn will be illuminated.
str.local: 任何人只要看到这把武器，在 他的回合最后就会发亮。

str.value: 33% of damage taken is copied to all nearby creatures and you are healed for half of the damage caused this way.
str.local: 受到的伤害的 33% 会复制给所 有附近的生物，而你会被治愈 这种方式造成的伤害的一半。

str.value: Jumping no longer requires energy and it always succeeds.
str.local: 跳跃不再需要精力点，而且永 远成功。

str.value: Miscasting always turns you invisible in addition to other effects.
str.local: 施法失误在造成其它影响之外 一定会将你隐身。

str.value: Poisons applied to weapons last forever and count as potent when they are applied.
str.local: 在武器上的淬毒永远生效，且 视作强效。

str.value: Automatically casts Enlarge Orb at the end of your turn if you are not already affected by it.
str.local: 如果你没有施放 法术球增大 ，那么在你的回合结束的时候 就自动施放它。

str.value: Woof comes back to life at the start of a new dungeon if he happens to be dead (reset dungeon in town).
str.local: 如果汪汪死了，那么在每个新 的地牢开始时会复活（在城镇 中重置）。

str.id: You feel as if there is no hope remaining.
str.value: You feel as if there is no hope remaining.
str.local: 你觉得似乎已经没有任何希望了。

str.id: You feel as if there is still some hope remaining.
str.value: You feel as if there is still some hope remaining.
str.local: 你觉得似乎还有一点希望。

str.id: You feel as if a shadow has been lifted from your shoulders.
str.value: You feel as if a shadow has been lifted from your shoulders.
str.local: 你觉得好像有一个阴影从你的肩膀升起。

str.id: %s bursts out of the ground and consumes %s.
str.value: %s bursts out of the ground and consumes %s.

str.id: %s pushes you aside as it comes forth.
str.value: %s pushes you aside as it comes forth.

str.id: %s plunges straight through your body as it comes forth.
str.value: %s plunges straight through your body as it comes forth.
str.local: %s出现了，直接穿过了你的身体。

str.id: %s pushes you aside as it comes out from the depths.
str.value: %s pushes you aside as it comes out from the depths.

str.id: %s plunges straight through your body as it comes out from the depths.
str.value: %s plunges straight through your body as it comes out from the depths.
str.local: %s从深处出现，直接穿过了你的身体。

str.id: %s seems somewhat triggered by your deplorable presence.
str.value: %s seems somewhat triggered by your deplorable presence.
str.local: %s似乎是你可悲的存在触发的。

str.id: %s yells: %s, come forth and fulfill your oath!
str.value: %s yells: %s, come forth and fulfill your oath!

str.local: 你在这里看见了一个破损的%s。
你在这里看见一个弄脏的%s。
你在这里看见一个浸湿的%s。
你看见这里有%s通向上面。
你看见这里有%s通向下面。
你看到了%s以及 %d 件其它物品。

str.id: You see %s and %d other items here.
str.value: You see %s and %d other items here.
str.local: 你看到这里有%s以及 %d 件其它物品。

str.id: You step on %s and fall down.
str.value: You step on %s and fall down.

str.id: You step on a hidden %s and fall down.
str.value: You step on a hidden %s and fall down.
str.local: 你踏上一个隐藏的%s，摔了下去。

str.id: You step on %s and something hits you.
str.value: You step on %s and something hits you.
str.local: 你踏上%s，有什么东西击中了你。

str.id: You step on a hidden %s and something hits you.
str.value: You step on a hidden %s and something hits you.
str.local: 你踩上一个隐藏的%s，有什么东西击中了你。

str.id: You step on %s but nothing seems to happen.
str.value: You step on %s but nothing seems to happen.
str.local: 你踏上%s，不过什么也没有发生。

str.id: You step on something that feels like %s.
str.value: You step on something that feels like %s.
str.local: 你踩上了什么东西，感觉像%s。

str.id: You step on something that feels like a corpse.
str.value: You step on something that feels like a corpse.
str.local: 你踩到一个像尸体的东西。

str.id: You bump into something that feels like %s.
str.value: You bump into something that feels like %s.
str.local: 你不小心碰到了什么，感觉像%s。
你小心翼翼地避开一个隐藏的%s。

str.id: You disarm %s into a trap kit.
str.value: You disarm %s into a trap kit.
str.local: 你将%s解除得到一个陷阱包。

str.id: You attempt to disarm %s but you stumble on it.
str.value: You attempt to disarm %s but you stumble on it.
str.local: 你试着解除%s，可是却绊到了。

str.id: You fail to break free from %s.
str.value: You fail to break free from %s.
str.local: 你未能从%s之中挣脱出来。

str.id: You fail to climb out of %s.
str.value: You fail to climb out of %s.

str.id: You are too tired to break free from %s.
str.value: You are too tired to break free from %s.

str.id: You are too tired to climb out of %s.
str.value: You are too tired to climb out of %s.

str.id: You wonder who put this %s here.
str.value: You wonder who put this %s here.
str.local: 你想知道是谁把%s放在这里的。

str.id: You wonder how this %s ended here.
str.value: You wonder how this %s ended here.
str.local: 你想知道这里的%s最后会怎样。

str.id: You wonder who dug this %s here.
str.value: You wonder who dug this %s here.
str.local: 你想知道是谁在这里把%s挖出来的。

str.id: You hear alarm bells in the distance.
str.value: You hear alarm bells in the distance.
str.local: 你听见了附近的警铃声。

str.value: A boulder falls down from the ceiling but %s catches it before it can do any damage.
str.local: 从天花板上落下了一块巨石，不过%s抓住了它，没有造成任何伤害。

str.value: A boulder falls down from the ceiling on %s but it just passes through.
str.local: %s头顶的天花板上落下了一块巨石，擦身而过。

str.value: A boulder falls down but you step aside before being flattened.
str.local: 一块巨石落下，你在被砸扁前闪到了一边。

str.value: A boulder falls down but %s steps aside before being flattened.
str.local: 一块巨石落下，%s在被砸扁前闪到了一边。

str.value: A boulder falls down from the ceiling and flattens %s.
str.local: 从天花板上落下了一块巨石，砸扁了%s。

str.value: A boulder falls down from the ceiling and sinks in the chasm.
str.local: 从天花板上落下了一块巨石，沉入了深坑。

str.value: A boulder falls down from the ceiling.
str.local: 从天花板上落下了一块巨石。

str.value: The boulder lands on %s and tears it apart before sinking in a chasm.
str.local: 那块巨石落在了 %s 上面，将它砸成了几块，然后沉入了深坑。

str.value: A boulder falls down on %s and tears it apart before sinking in a chasm.
str.local: 一块巨石落在了 %s 上面，将它砸成了几块，然后沉入了深坑。

str.value: The boulder lands on %s and breaks it.
str.local: 那块巨石落在了 %s 上面，砸坏了它。

str.value: A boulder falls down on %s and breaks it.
str.local: 一块巨石落在了 %s 上面，砸坏了它。

str.value: The boulder lands on %s and seals it shut.
str.local: 那块巨石落在了 %s 上面，封掉了它。

str.value: A boulder falls down on %s and seals it shut.
str.local: 一块巨石落在了 %s 上面，封掉了它。

str.value: The boulder lands on %s and destroys everything inside.
str.local: 那块巨石落在了 %s 上面，摧毁了里面的一切。

str.value: A boulder falls down on %s and destroys everything inside.
str.local: 一块巨石落在了 %s 上面，摧毁了里面的一切。

str.value: A gate falls down on %s but it just passes through.
str.local: 一座闸门从 %s 头上落下，擦身而过。

str.value: A gate falls down but you step aside before being mangled.
str.local: 一座闸门落下，你在被砍断前躲开了。

str.value: A gate falls down but %s steps aside before being mangled.
str.local: 一座闸门落下，%s在被砍断前躲开了。

str.value: You fail to pick the lock on %s.
You fail to pick the lock on %s and its trap is sprung.
str.local: 你未能打开%s上的锁，还触发了上面的机关。

str.value: You fail to pick the lock on %s and its tumblers reset.
str.local: 你未能打开%s上的锁，它的齿轮重置了。

str.value: The door seems to be broken and it won't close.
str.local: 这扇门看起来坏掉了，无法再关闭。

str.value: You try to open %s but it seems to be locked.
str.local: 你试着打开%s，但它似乎锁上了。

str.value: You kick %s and it cracks wide open.
str.local: 你踹向%s，它裂开了个大口。

str.value: You kick %s and it cracks to pieces.
You kick %s and it tumbles to the ground.
You kick %s but it doesn't seem to budge.
str.local: 你踹向%s，它似乎纹丝不动。

str.value: You attempt to kick %s but you trip over and hit it with your head instead.
str.local: 你原本想踢%s，可是绊倒了，你的头撞了它。

str.value: You kick %s and it is properly defiled.
str.local: 你踹了%s一脚，它被弄脏了。

str.value: You kick %s but its occupant doesn't seem all that pleased.
str.local: 你踢了%s一脚，它的主人似乎不太高兴。

str.value: You kick %s causing it to be stuck for good.
str.local: 你踢了%s一脚，它永远卡住了。

str.value: You kick %s but it springs back and throws you on the floor.
str.local: 你踢了%s一脚，它弹了起来，把你摔在地板上。

str.value: You kick %s but it revolves back and hits you on the nuts.
str.local: 你踢了%s一脚，它弹了回来，击中了你的蛋蛋。

str.value: You kick %s but its trap is sprung and a poison dart hits you.
str.local: 你踢了%s一脚，触发了陷阱，毒箭击中了你。

str.value: You can't seem to figure out a way to use the broken %s.
str.local: 你似乎找不到使用这个坏掉的%s的方法。

str.value: You can't seem to figure out a way to use the defiled %s.
str.local: 你似乎找不到使用这个脏掉的%s的方法。

str.value: You can't seem to figure out a way to disarm %s.
str.local: 你似乎找不到解除%s的方法。
你从%s采到了一个血蘑菇。

str.value: You attempt to harvest %s but it spews spores on your face.
str.local: 你试图去采%s，但它的孢子喷了你一脸。

str.value: You browse through the contents of %s.
You look into the depths of %s.
You delve in your thoughts with %s.
You try to practice with %s but you don't feel talented enough.
str.local: 你想用%s进行练习，但是觉得天赋还不够。

str.value: You try to look into the depths of %s but you don't feel talented enough.
str.local: 你试着望进%s的深处，但是觉得天赋还不够。

str.value: You try to contemplate your thoughts at %s but you don't feel talented enough.
str.local: 你试着在%s边沉思，但是觉得天赋还不够。

str.value: You try to delve in your thoughts with %s but you don't feel talented enough.
str.local: 你想用%s探究自己的内心，但是觉得天赋还不够。

str.value: There's nothing that this broken %s can teach you.
str.local: 这个坏掉的%s什么都教不了你。

str.value: There's nothing that this doused %s can teach you.
str.local: 这个浸湿的%s什么都教不了你。

str.value: You are not spiritually attuned to commune with this totem.
str.local: 你的精神未能协调到和这个图腾沟通。

str.value: You step on something and feel crippling pain.
str.local: 你踩到了什么东西，感到一阵剧痛。

str.value: You step on something and feel sharp pain.
str.local: 你踩到了什么东西，感到一阵刺痛。

str.value: You step into something and become entangled.
str.local: 你踩到了什么东西，被缠住了。

str.value: You float into something and become entangled.
str.local: 你撞到什么东西，被缠住了。

str.value: You fall down and feel sharp pain.
str.local: 你跌落了，感到一阵刺痛。

str.value: You fall down in a water pit.
You take a step and something hits you.
str.local: 你走了一步，什么东西击中了你。

str.value: You attempt to carefully avoid %s but you accidentally stumble on it.
str.local: 您小心翼翼地避开%s，但却被意外地绊到了。

str.value: You attempt to break free from %s but it just claws deeper into your leg.
str.local: 你试图挣脱%s，但它的钩爪却深深地扎进你的腿中。

str.value: As you move out of %s, you manage to stumble on one of the spikes.
str.local: 在你想离开%s时，你却被其中一个尖刺绊倒。

str.value: You attempt to break free from %s but you are interrupted by a strange sound.
str.local: 你试图挣脱%s，却被一个奇怪的声音打断了。

str.value: You attempt to climb out of %s but you fail miserably and fall down.
str.local: 你试图爬出%s，但一个失误让你又摔了下去。

str.value: You attempt to climb out of %s but you end up inhaling some water.
str.local: 你试图爬出%s，但却呛了一口水。

str.value: As you move out of %s something hits you in the back.
str.local: 当你想走出%s时，有什么击中了你的后背。

str.value: You rest and feel a bit more energetic.
str.local: 你休息了一下，感觉精力更充沛了。

str.value: You rest but you feel blood gushing out of your trapped leg.
str.local: 你休息了一下，但却感觉到血从你被困的腿中喷涌而出。

str.value: You rest until you manage to stumble on one of the spikes.
str.local: 你休息了一下，但又被其中一根刺绊倒。

str.value: You rest until you hear a strange sound above you.
str.local: 你休息了一下，在你的上方传来一个奇怪的声音。

str.value: You rest and enjoy your stay until you stumble on one of the spikes.
str.local: 你休息了一下，然后被刺扎了一下。

str.value: You rest and try to enjoy the bath but you end up inhaling some water.
str.local: 你休息了一下，本想借机洗个澡，结果却被呛了水。

str.value: You rest and imagine about boiling a frog when something hits you.
str.local: 你休息了一下，感觉自己像只锅里的青蛙，被击中了一下。

str.value: You step on something and now everyone knows you're here!
str.local: 你踩到什么东西，现在大家都知道你在这里！

str.value: You step on something and hear rumbling coming from above.
str.local: 你踩到什么东西，听到上面传来隆隆声。

str.value: You step on something and hear some mechanical sounds.
str.local: 你踩到什么东西，听到一些机械的声音。

str.value: You step on %s and now everyone knows you're here!
str.local: 你踩到%s，现在大家都知道你在这里！

str.value: You step on %s and hear rumbling coming from above.
str.local: 你踩到%s，上面传来隆隆声。

str.value: You step on %s and hear some mechanical sounds.
str.local: 你踩到%s，听到一些机械的声音。

str.value: You see %s that is attached to a number of alarm bells.
str.local: 你看见%s，上面有一组铃铛。

str.value: You see %s that drops a boulder hanging from the ceiling.
str.local: 你看见%s，连着天花板上的一块巨石。

str.value: You see %s that seems to be connected to a gate nearby.
str.local: 你看见%s，似乎连接着附近的一道闸门。

str.value: %s died of old age several years after retiring from adventuring.
str.local: 隐退多年之后，%s死于衰老。

str.value: %s died of severe anxiety caused by trying to cheat the game.
str.local: %s死于极其渴望在游戏中作弊。

str.value: %s died of, well, nobody really knows why.
str.local: %s死于…… 没有真的知道死因。

str.value: %s died of a cracked skull after jumping face first on the floor.
str.local: %s在跳跃时脸先着地，死于头骨碎裂。

str.value: %s died of a charred skin syndrome after falling down to a lava chasm.
str.local: %s掉落到岩浆之中，死于皮肤烧焦后的并发症。

str.value: %s died of drowning after falling down to a water chasm.
%s died of magical damage caused by an angered soul.
str.local: %s被一个愤怒的灵魂发出的魔法伤害致死。

str.value: %s died of a severe charring after standing too long in the flaming aura of %s.
str.local: %s由于站在%s的火焰光环中过久而被碳化。

str.value: %s died of a severe frostbite after standing too long in the frozen aura of %s.
str.local: %s由于站在%s的冰霜光环中过久而被冻死。

str.value: %s died of a heart attack after standing too long in the electric aura of %s.
str.local: %s由于站在%s的雷电光环中过久而被电死。

str.value: %s died of poison vapours after standing too long in the venomous aura of %s.
str.local: %s由于站在%s的剧毒光环中过久而毒发身亡。

str.value: %s died of cardiac arrest after standing too long in the virulent aura of %s.
str.local: %s由于站在%s的瘟疫光环中过久而死于心脏病。

str.value: %s died of damage caused by a hateful aura.
%s died of asphyxiation caused by amulet of asphyxia
%s died of petrification caused by amulet of stone form.
%s died of damage caused by curse of agony.
%s died of damage caused by deadly poison.
%s died of damage caused by leeching poison.
%s died of damage caused by bloody flux disease.
%s died of fire damage caused by being on fire, duh!
%s died of exsanguination caused by a bleeding wound.
%s ate too much and choked to death.
%s drank too much and drowned to death.
%s ate too little and died of hunger.
%s drank too little and died of thirst.
%s died of a full body tentacle penetration of the worst kind.
%s was killed by %s own attack that was reflected back by %s.
%s died of an acute lack of intact bones caused by a falling boulder.
str.local: %s被一块大石头落下砸为肉饼。

str.value: %s died of a broken neck after plunging head first against a door.
%s died of too many extra breathing holes caused by a falling gate.
str.local: 掉落的大门在%s的脸上多穿了几个呼吸孔。

str.value: %s died of a sprained back after being violently jerked by a lever.
str.local: %s猛拉杠杆，结果严重扭伤了背肌而死。

str.value: %s died of a high-pitched voice after being hit in the nuts by a lever.
str.local: 杠杆击中螺母发出的啸叫音杀死了%s。

str.value: %s died of poison damage resulting from inhaling mushroom spores.
str.local: %s因吸入蘑菇孢子而中毒死亡。

str.value: %s died of poison damage caused by an unstable shroom that went boom.
str.local: %s死于不稳定蘑菇的爆炸所造成的中毒。

str.value: %s died of a fractured skull after headbutting a sign.
str.local: %s的头撞到了指示牌，头骨骨折。

str.value: %s died of poison damage resulting from trying to break a trapped %s.
str.local: %s在试图破坏陷阱%s时，中毒身亡。

str.value: %s died of poison damage resulting from trying to pick a trapped %s.
str.local: %s在试图拆除陷阱%s时，中毒身亡。

str.value: %s died of a mutilated leg after stepping on a bear trap.
str.local: %s在踩到捕熊器后，因腿部重伤而死。

str.value: %s died of a pierced artery after stepping on a spike trap.
%s died of a pierced lung after falling down to a spiked pit.
%s died of drowning after falling down to a water pit.
%s died of damage caused by a magic trap.
str.local: %s被一个魔法陷阱造成的伤害致死。

str.value: %s died of a mutilated leg while resting on a bear trap.
str.local: %s在一个捕熊器上休息，腿部不幸被夹住，重伤而亡。

str.value: %s died of a pierced artery while resting on a spike trap.
str.local: %s在一个尖刺陷阱上休息，动脉被刺穿。

str.value: %s died of a pierced lung while resting in a spiked pit.
str.local: %s在一个尖刺坑中休息，肺部被刺穿。

str.value: %s died of drowning while trying to escape a water pit.
str.local: %s在尝试爬出一个水坑时溺水身亡。

str.value: %s died of damage caused by a magic trap.
str.local: %s被一个魔法陷阱造成的伤害致死。

str.value: %s died of fire damage caused by a potion of burning.
str.local: %s被燃烧药剂造成的火焰伤害致死。

str.value: %s died of damage caused by a cursed potion of healing.
str.local: %s死于一瓶被诅咒的治疗药剂。

str.value: %s died of magic damage caused by a potion of holy water.
str.local: %s死于一瓶圣水造成的魔法伤害。

str.value: %s died of an instant death effect caused by a potion of holy water.
str.local: %s死于一瓶圣水造成的即死效果。

str.value: %s died of strain caused by casting a spell without energy.
str.local: %s在没有精力时施放法术，力竭而亡。

str.value: %s died of damage caused by a miscast spell.
%s died of %s damage caused by %s own %s.
str.local: %s死于 %s 伤害，它是 %s 自己的 %s 造成的。
%s死于 %s 伤害，它是 %s 的 %s 造成的。

str.value: %s died of an instant death effect caused by %s own %s.
str.local: %s死于即死效果，它是 %s 自己的 %s 造成的。

str.value: %s died of an instant death effect caused by %s's %s.
str.local: %s死于即死效果，它是 %s 的 %s 造成的。

str.value: %s died of too many lost chest hairs caused by failed transmutation.
str.local: %s的点金术失败，胸毛掉落太多而死。

str.id: You have returned a schematic titled '%s'!
str.value: You have returned a schematic titled '%s'!
str.local: 你归还了一张题为 ‘%s’ 的图纸！

str.id: You have cleared the dungeon but you are not alone!
str.value: You have cleared the dungeon but you are not alone!
str.local: 你清空了地牢，但你并不孤单！

str.id: I offer my dungeon to you
str.value: I offer my dungeon to you

str.local: 存下 %d 或更多的金币。

str.id: Empty your backpack and reset dungeon with 0 gold.
str.value: Empty your backpack and reset dungeon with 0 gold.
str.local: 将你的背包清空，一个金币 都不留，重置地牢。
存下 %d 或更多的金币。
达到 18 级或更高等级。

str.value: Why hello there. I'm the annoying user interface dog and my super accurate canine senses tell me that this is the
str.local: 嘿，你好啊。我是只讨人嫌的界面狗，我敏锐 的直觉告诉我这是你第一次玩这个游戏……

str.value: first time you're playing this game...
Please pay attention now. I'll be telling this only once and failure to comprehend will lead you to ask silly questions
str.local: 请注意听讲。我只说一次，如果你不仔细听以 后肯定会跑到网上问各种傻问题……

str.value: Allrighty then. You can move onto any of the eight adjacent tiles by using the keypad or by clicking in the desired
str.local: 让我们开始吧。你可以按小键盘数字键向邻近 的八个地块移动，鼠标点击想去的方向也可以 ……

str.value: Now that looks like a nasty creature. If you want, you can attack it by moving towards it...
str.local: 现在那里有个讨厌的生物。如果你想攻击它只 需要向它移动……

str.value: You can use adjacent map objects or items by holding down the Ctrl-key and pressing the relevant movement key
str.local: 想使用旁边的地图物品，可以按住 Ctrl 键再 按对应的方向，或是用鼠标右键点击对应的方 向也可以……

str.value: or by right-clicking in the desired direction...
You can view the loot under your feet by holding down the Loot-key (Default: Alt) or by clicking the right side of the
str.local: 按住拾取键（默认：Alt）可以浏览你脚下的拾 取品，或是用鼠标点击屏幕右侧……

str.value: Whenever you're fatigued or wounded, you can rest and gain energy or health with the Rest-button (Default: Keypad5)
str.local: 一旦你开始疲惫或受伤，你可以通过按下休息 按钮（默认：小键盘 5）休息来获得精力和生 命点，鼠标点自己也可以……

str.value: Note, however, that in order to gain health, you must have both hunger and thirst satiated (see the bottom right
str.local: 注意：要获得生命值，必须不在饥饿和口渴的 状态下（看一下右下角）……

str.value: You can equip and use items in the inventory after bringing it up with the Equip-button (Default: E) or by clicking on
str.local: 你可以在物品界面使用和装备物品，按装备按 钮（默认：E）可以弹出。用鼠标点击屏幕右侧 也可以……

str.value: the right side of the screen...
While the inventory is shown, you can equip and use items with the Enter-key. If you also hold down the Shift-key
str.local: 在物品界面显示时，你可以通过 Enter 键装备 或使用物品。你还可以按下 Shift 键把物品装 备在副手栏位……

str.value: you can equip an item in the offhand...
Alternatively, you can click an item to use or equip it or you can drag and drop the item in the chosen slot (or out of
str.local: 第二种选择是，你可以鼠标点击物品来装备或 使用它，也可以拖拽物品到指定槽位（或拖出 物品界面）……

str.value: You can drop items from the inventory after bringing it up with the Drop-button (Default: D) or you can drag and
str.local: 你可以按下丢弃按钮（默认：D）弹出物品界面 ，然后丢弃物品。用鼠标拖拽也可以……

str.value: You can throw items from the inventory after bringing it up with the Throw-button (Default: F) or you can right-click
str.local: 你可以按下投掷按钮（默认：F）弹出物品界面 ，然后投掷物品。用鼠标右键也可以投掷……

str.value: Excellent! I see you have found yourself a ranged weapon. You can make ranged attacks with the Attack-button
str.local: 太棒了！我发现你自己找到了一件远程武器。 你可以通过攻击按钮（默认：A）进行远程攻击 ……

str.value: Your weapon needs to be rearmed before it can be used again. This is done automatically if you rest while having
str.local: 你的武器需要进行整备才能再次使用。这个过 程在你装备有该武器时通过休息可以自动完成 ……

str.value: You can use stairs and ladders by pressing the Enter-key...
str.local: 按一下 Enter 键可以使用楼梯或梯子……

str.value: Oh look, you have earned your first talent point. You can spend it by visiting a trainer or by using one of the trainer
str.local: 看，你获得了第一个天赋点。你可以通过拜访 导师或使用训练地块来用掉它……

str.value: Note, however, that you can learn a maximum of six talents and there's no money back guarantee, so choose them
str.local: 注意：你最多只能学习六项天赋，没有退款服 务。所以，想好了再选……

str.value: Great choice! You can use the talent you just learned through the spellbook by pressing the Cast-button (Default: C)...
str.local: 明智的选择！你可以通过按下施法按钮（默认 ：C）打开法术书使用你刚学到的天赋……

str.value: Way to go you little Wizard! You can cast the spell you just learned through the spellbook by pressing the Cast-button
str.local: 小法师出击！你可以通过按下施法按钮（默认 ：C）打开法术书施展你刚学的法术……

str.value: You can bind and unbind spells and active talents on hotkeys by selecting one and pressing a Hotkey-button
str.local: 你可以将主动天赋和法术绑定到热键或解绑， 只需选择它然后按下热键（默认：1,2,3,4,5, 6,7 ）……

str.value: Oh look, you have gained a friend. You can order friends to follow you, move to a location or attack a target with the
str.local: 看，你获得了一个朋友。你可以命令朋友跟随 你、移动到一个位置、或攻击一个目标，按下 聚焦键即可（默认：X）……

str.value: Great job, you've cleared the dungeon. Now you can quickly travel back to town with the Travel-button (Default: T)...
str.local: 干得漂亮，你清空了地牢。现在你可以按下旅 行（默认：T）快速回到城镇……

str.value: Ouch, that's gotta hurt. I don't want to rub it in but you could've found the trap with the Search-button (Default: S)...
str.local: 哎哟，好疼。我不想重复唠叨，其实你可以通 过按下搜索按钮（默认：Ｓ）来提前发现陷阱 的……

str.value: So that's where I dug the hole. You can try to jump over it with the Jump-button (Default: Q)...
str.local: 这里是我挖的一个洞。你可以试一下按跳跃按 钮（默认：Q）越过它……

str.value: If you can't seem to figure out what something is you can take a look at it with the Look-button (Default: V)...
str.local: 如果你不确定那个东西是什么，你可以按下观 察按钮（默认：V）看一眼……

str.value: Look at all that junk... I mean valuables! If you need some quick space you can arrange your inventory with the
str.local: 看看这些垃圾…… 我的意思是这些宝贝！如果你 需要腾点空间出来，你可以按下排序按钮（默 认：R）整理一下……

str.value: Yikes, you might actually have what it takes to beat this game. You can check your heritage rewards by pressing F3...
str.local: 呀！你可能获得了通关这个游戏的关键。按一 下 F3 查看一下你的遗产奖励……

str.id: Press and hold %s to view all tutorial entries.
str.value: Press and hold %s to view all tutorial entries.
str.local: 按住 %s 浏览所有的教学项。

str.id: This heritage can't be unlocked on casual difficulty level.
str.value: This heritage can't be unlocked on casual difficulty level.
str.local: 这项遗产无法在休闲难度级别 下解锁。

str.id: This heritage is not available on heroic difficulty level.
str.value: This heritage is not available on heroic difficulty level.
str.local: 这项遗产不能用于英雄难度级 别。

str.value: Equips the rogue with a staff at the start of the game.
str.local: 在游戏开始时给游侠装备一把 杖。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents:
str.local: 通过学习下列天赋可以解锁这 项遗产：

str.value: Equips the rogue with a bow and arrows at the start of the game.
str.local: 在游戏开始时给游侠装备弓箭 。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents:
str.local: 通过学习下列天赋可以解锁这 项遗产：

str.value: Equips the rogue with 3 throwing knives at the start of the game.
str.local: 在游戏开始时给游侠装备三把 飞刀。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents:
str.local: 通过学习下列天赋可以解锁这 项遗产：

str.value: Equips the rogue with a sword and buckler at the start of the game.
str.local: 在游戏开始时给游侠装备剑盾 。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents:
str.local: 通过学习下列天赋可以解锁这 项遗产：

str.value: Equips the rogue with a leather armour set at the start of the game.
str.local: 在游戏开始时给游侠装备皮甲 套装。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by killing any monster.
str.local: 杀死任何一个巨怪可以解锁这 项遗产。

str.value: Note that monsters are visibly larger than your average creature.
str.local: 注意：巨怪看起来要比一般的 生物大的多。

str.value: Equips the rogue with a potion of antidote at the start of the game.
str.local: 在游戏开始时给游侠装备一瓶 解毒药剂。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by reaching level %d.
str.local: 升级到等级 %d 可以解锁这项 遗产。

str.value: Equips the rogue with a potion of healing at the start of the game.
str.local: 在游戏开始时给游侠装备一瓶 治疗药剂。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by reaching level %d.
str.local: 升级到等级 %d 可以解锁这项 遗产。

str.value: Teaches Literacy: Common as the seventh talent at the start of the game.
str.local: 读写：常识 作为第七项天赋， 在游戏一开始就已经学会。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning the secret seventh talent.
str.local: 学会隐藏的第七天赋可以解锁 这项遗产。

str.value: Places a blessing on the main hand weapon at the start of the game.
str.local: 在游戏一开始，祝福主手武器 。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by viewing all tutorial entries.
str.local: 浏览完所有的教程项目可以解 锁这项遗产。

str.value: Places a random enchant on the main hand weapon at the start of the game.
str.local: 在游戏一开始，给主手武器进 行一次随机附魔。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by having 11 enchanted items equipped at the same time (shirt or robe don't count).
str.local: 同时穿戴上 11 个附魔过的装 备可以解锁这项遗产（衬衫和 头巾不计入内）。
获得针对蘑菇效果的免疫力。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by reaching level 20 while eating only blood cap mushrooms.
str.local: 在升到 20 级之前，只吃血蘑 菇可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Grants ability to use the following talents while unarmed:%s
str.local: 在被缴械后，获得使用下列天 赋的技能：%s

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by reaching level 20 while causing physical damage with fists only.
str.local: 在升到 20 级之前，只使用拳 头对敌人造成物理伤害可以解 锁这项遗产。

str.value: Improves Trap Master talent so that it also works with magic traps.
str.local: 增强陷阱大师天赋，让其可以 作用于魔法陷阱。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by finding three or more hidden magic traps with the search button in a single game.
str.local: 在单局游戏中，用搜索按钮找 到三个或更多魔法陷阱，可以 解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Grants a +1 modifier to all reflex checks.
str.local: 针对所有的反射检定，获得 + 1 修正。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by passing three or more reflex checks in a single game.
str.local: 在单局游戏中，通过三次或更 多反射检定，可以解锁这项遗 产。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by visiting the graves of all Heroes of Hallwood:
str.local: 拜访所有的圣林英雄之墓，可 以解锁这项遗产：

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by having %d or more points of fire resistance at any given time.
str.local: 在任何时刻拥有 %d 或更高的 火焰抗性可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by having %d or more points of frost resistance at any given time.
str.local: 在任何时刻拥有 %d 或更高的 冰霜抗性可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by having %d or more points of shock resistance at any given time.
str.local: 在任何时刻拥有 %d 或更高的 震击抗性可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by having %d or more points of poison resistance at any given time.
str.local: 在任何时刻拥有 %d 或更高的 毒害抗性可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by having %d or more points of disease resistance at any given time.
str.local: 在任何时刻拥有 %d 或更高的 疾病抗性可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Grants ability to use wands without learning how to read.
str.local: 在没有学习读写前就获得使用 魔杖的能力。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning six talents without learning how to read.
str.local: 在学习读写前学习六项天赋可 以获得这项遗产。

str.value: Grants knowledge of one random Celestial spell at the start of the game.
str.local: 在游戏开始时获得一个随机天 使系法术的知识。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Celestial spells in a single game.
str.local: 在单局游戏中学会所有的天使 系法术可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Grants knowledge of one random Draconic spell at the start of the game.
str.local: 在游戏开始时获得一个随机龙 系法术的知识。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Draconic spells in a single game.
str.local: 在单局游戏中学会所有的龙系 法术可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Grants knowledge of one random Infernal spell at the start of the game.
str.local: 在游戏开始时获得一个随机地 狱系法术的知识。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Infernal spells in a single game.
str.local: 在单局游戏中学会所有的地狱 系法术可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Allows you to learn Arcane spells with Literacy: Common while using any amulet.
str.local: 允许你在使用任何项链时，依 靠读写：常识就能学习奥术。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Arcane spells in a single game.
str.local: 在单局游戏中学会所有的奥术 可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Allows you to learn Bestial spells with Literacy: Common and without levitation.
str.local: 允许你依靠读写：常识就能学 习兽性法术，而不必漂浮。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Bestial spells in a single game.
str.local: 在单局游戏中学会所有的兽性 法术可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Allows you to learn Abyssal spells with Literacy: Common and without black soul gems.
str.local: 允许你依靠读写：常识就能学 习深渊系法术，而不需要黑色 魂晶。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all Abyssal spells in a single game.
str.local: 在单局游戏中学会所有的深渊 法术可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Grants knowledge of all amulet effects at the start of the game.
str.local: 在游戏开始获得所有项链效果 的知识。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all amulet effects in a single game.
str.local: 在单局游戏中学会所有的项链 效果可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Grants knowledge of all ring effects at the start of the game.
str.local: 在游戏开始获得所有戒指效果 的知识。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all ring effects in a single game.
str.local: 在单局游戏中学会所有的戒指 效果可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Grants knowledge of all wand effects at the start of the game.
str.local: 在游戏开始获得所有魔杖效果 的知识。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all wand effects in a single game.
str.local: 在单局游戏中学会所有的魔杖 效果可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Grants knowledge of all scroll effects at the start of the game.
str.local: 在游戏开始获得所有卷轴效果 的知识。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all scroll effects in a single game.
str.local: 在单局游戏中学会所有的卷轴 效果可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Grants knowledge of all potion effects at the start of the game.
str.local: 在游戏开始获得所有药剂效果 的知识。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all potion effects in a single game.
str.local: 在单局游戏中学会所有的药剂 效果可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Grants knowledge of all enchant effects at the start of the game and gives you a 20% discount at the Wizards' Guild.
str.local: 在游戏开始获得所有附魔效果 的知识，法师行会可以给你八 折优惠。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning all enchant effects in a single game.
str.local: 在单局游戏中学会所有的附魔 效果可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Allows you to enchant your black shirt or robe.
str.local: 允许你对你的黑色衬衫和头巾 进行附魔。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a black shirt or robe and defiling graves until you see something purple.
str.local: 解锁这项遗产需要你在穿着黑 色衬衫或头巾时，把坟墓弄脏 直到看到某些紫色的东西。

str.value: Allows you to enchant your red shirt or robe.
str.local: 允许你对你的红色衬衫和头巾 进行附魔。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a red shirt or robe and eating some meat.
str.local: 解锁这项遗产需要你在穿着红 色衬衫或头巾时吃肉。

str.value: Allows you to enchant your green shirt or robe.
str.local: 允许你对你的绿色衬衫和头巾 进行附魔。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a green shirt or robe and destroying an item by throwing it to a wall.
str.local: 解锁这项遗产需要你在穿着绿 色衬衫或头巾时把一件物品扔 到墙上摔碎。

str.value: Allows you to enchant your blue shirt or robe.
str.local: 允许你对你的蓝色衬衫和头巾 进行附魔。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a blue shirt or robe and dropping an item while stuck in a water pit.
str.local: 解锁这项遗产需要你在穿着蓝 色衬衫或头巾时掉到水坑中抛 弃一件物品。

str.value: Allows you to enchant your orange shirt or robe.
str.local: 允许你对你的橙色衬衫和头巾 进行附魔。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by wearing an orange shirt or robe and wielding two swords at the same time.
str.local: 解锁这项遗产需要你在穿着橙 色衬衫或头巾时同时拿着两把 剑。

str.value: Allows you to enchant your yellow shirt or robe.
str.local: 允许你对你的黄色衬衫和头巾 进行附魔。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a yellow shirt or robe and flipping a coin until you get three tails in a row.
str.local: 解锁这项遗产需要你在穿着黄 色衬衫或头巾时抛投硬币，直 到连续掷出三个背面。

str.value: Allows you to enchant your pink shirt or robe.
str.local: 允许你对你的粉色衬衫和头巾 进行附魔。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a pink shirt or robe and saying '%s' without the quotes on the chat.
str.local: 解锁这项遗产需要你在穿着粉 色衬衫或头巾时，在聊天频道 说出 ‘%s’ （不带引号）。

str.value: Allows you to enchant your white shirt or robe.
str.local: 允许你对你的白色衬衫和头巾 进行附魔。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by wearing a white shirt or robe and using a soul gem until you receive your multipass.
str.local: 解锁这项遗产需要你在穿着白 色衬衫或头巾时使用魂晶，知 道你获得你的多通道。

str.value: Your shirt or robe is now blessed and it may contain two enchants.
str.local: 你的衬衫和头巾现在被祝福过 了，可以进行两次附魔。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by obtaining a score of over 9000 after unlocking all 8 shirt heritages above.
str.local: 解锁这项遗产需要在你解锁以 上八项遗产后，获得 9000 分 以上。

str.value: Gives you absolutely nothing since you obviously don't need any help.
str.local: 既然你明显不需要任何帮助， 那么当然什么也给不了你。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by killing Gurmur and interrupting the cultists' plan to take over the world.
str.local: 杀死咕呣终止邪教徒征服世界 的计划可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Gives you a dog named Woof at the start of the game.
str.local: 在游戏开始给你一只叫汪汪的 狗。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by killing a Dread Wolf.
str.local: 杀死骇狼可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Allows you to see Woof's health bar.
str.local: 允许你看见汪汪的血条。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by taking a look at Woof while it is badly hurt or almost dead.
str.local: 在汪汪收到严重伤害或濒死时 看它一眼可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by rescuing Woof from a pit.
str.local: 从深坑中救出汪汪可以解锁这 项遗产。
汪汪获得 +1 物理抗性。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 3.
str.local: 把汪汪升到 3 级可以获得这项 遗产。

str.value: Upgrades Woof's Hardened Skin to +2 physical resistance and +1 chromatic resistance at level 3.
str.local: 在等级 3 时，升级汪汪的硬化 皮肤为 +2 物理抗性 +1 魔法 抗性。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 6.
str.local: 把汪汪升到 6 级可以获得这项 遗产。

str.value: Upgrades Woof's Hardened Skin to +3 physical resistance and +2 chromatic resistance at level 6.
str.local: 在等级 6 时，升级汪汪的硬化 皮肤为 +3 物理抗性 +2 魔法 抗性。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 9.
str.local: 把汪汪升到 9 级可以获得这项 遗产。

str.value: Upgrades Woof's Vicious Bite to Ferocius Bite at level 9.
str.local: 在等级 9 时，将汪汪的恶毒之 咬升级为暴虐之咬。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 12.
str.local: 把汪汪升到 12 级可以获得这 项遗产。

str.value: Grants Woof +D3 physical damage at level 12.
str.local: 汪汪在等级 12 时获得 +D3 物 理伤害。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof reach level 15.
str.local: 把汪汪升到 15 级可以获得这 项遗产。

str.value: Grants Woof +1 agility and +1 stamina at the start of the game and Heroic Charge at level 3.
str.local: 汪汪在游戏开始时获得 +1 敏 捷 +1 耐力，在等级 3 时获得 英勇冲锋。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof kill a Dire Wolf.
str.local: 让汪汪杀死骇狼可以解锁这项 遗产。

str.value: Grants Woof +1 agility and +1 stamina at the start of the game and Strong Will at level 6.
str.local: 汪汪在游戏开始时获得 +1 敏 捷 +1 耐力，在等级 6 时获得 坚强意志。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by having Woof kill a monster.
str.local: 让汪汪杀死一个巨怪可以解锁 这项遗产。

str.value: Allows the player to craft items in the Artisans' Guild (and enables crafting items in the loot tables).
str.local: 允许玩家在工匠行会内制造物 品（并在拾取表中开启制造物 ）。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by rescuing Artificer Leo Noerde and bringing him back to town.
str.local: 这个遗产可以通过解救鲁班大 师并带他回城来解锁。

str.id: Artisans' Guild now crafts blessed versions of the following items:%s
str.value: Artisans' Guild now crafts blessed versions of the following items:%s
str.local: 工匠行会现在制造的下列物品 会被祝福：%s

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by crafting all of the items marked with an asterisk in a single game.
str.local: 在单局游戏中制造出所有标记 有星号的物品可以解锁这项遗 产。

str.value: Crafted items are now enchanted and the enchant is guaranteed to be appropriate for the item as well as the player.
str.local: 制造出的物品现在自动附魔， 附魔效果保证是最适合该物品 的。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by donating four or more unique items to the Artisans' Guild in a single game.
str.local: 在单局游戏中向工匠行会捐赠 四个或更多的独特物品可以解 锁这项遗产。

str.value: Allows you to use spirit totems without killing bears for spiritual attunement.
str.local: 允许你不必杀死熊进行心灵调 和就可以使用心灵图腾。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by learning the following talents:%s
str.local: 学习下列天赋可以解说这项遗 产：%s

str.value: Improves bestial wrath talent so that it also casts renewing touch on you when you shapeshift.
str.local: 增强狂野怒火天赋，在你变形 时同时会施放一个回复之触。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by regaining over %d points of health while shapeshifted and in combat.
str.local: 在变形战斗过程中，获得超过 %d 点生命可以解锁这项遗产 。

str.value: Improves bestial wrath talent so that it also heals all your beast friends while shapeshifted.
str.local: 增强狂野怒火天赋，在你变形 时治疗你所有的野兽伙伴。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by shapeshifting while having %d or more beast friends.
str.local: 在你变形的同时拥有 %d 或更 多的野兽伙伴可以解锁这项遗 产。

str.value: Increases strength by 1 in bear form.
This heritage can be unlocked by having a strength modifier of +5 or more when you shapeshift into a bear.
str.local: 当你变形为熊的时候拥有 +5 力量修正可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Adds an instant kill effect to your attacks in bear form.
str.local: 熊形态的攻击附加一个即死效 果。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by killing a full health human with a single hit in bear form at level 20.
str.local: 在等级 20 时的熊形态下，一 击杀死一个满血的人类，可以 解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Casts renewing touch on you when you critically hit in bear form.
str.local: 熊形态下发出暴击的同时为你 施放一个回复之触。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by critically hitting any of the named encounter bosses in bear form.
str.local: 在遭遇战中，以熊形态暴击一 个有名的首领，可以解锁这项 遗产。

str.value: Increases agility by 1 in wolf form.
This heritage can be unlocked by having an agility modifier of +5 or more when you shapeshift into a wolf.
str.local: 当你变形为狼的时候拥有 +5 敏捷修正可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Adds a leech effect to your attacks in wolf form.
str.local: 狼形态的攻击附加一个吸血效 果。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by eating a dread bat that has leeched life from you while you are in wolf form.
str.local: 当你在狼形态时吃掉一只曾经 吸过你的生命的蝙蝠可以解锁 这项遗产。

str.value: Casts renewing touch on you when you critically hit in wolf form.
str.local: 狼形态下发出暴击的同时为你 施放一个回复之触。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by killing a full health human with a critical hit in wolf form at level 20.
str.local: 在等级 20 时的狼形态下，一 击杀死一个满血的人类，可以 解锁这项遗产。

str.value: Increases health and energy while shapeshifted.
str.local: 在变身时增加生命值和精力。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by killing %d monsters and eating their corpses while shapeshifted.
str.local: 在变身后杀死 %d 个巨怪并吃 掉它们的尸体。

str.value: Note that shapeshifting resets the counter and this must be completed in one shift.
str.local: 注意：施展变身术将重置计数 器，因此必须在一次变身中完 成。

str.value: Allows you to read Arcane tomes while having a matching amulet equipped (*).
str.local: 允许你在装备有对应的项链时 ，阅读奥术典籍 (*)。

str.value: Once you have learned an Arcane spell you can cast it while having any amulet equipped.
str.local: 一旦你学会了一门奥术，你可 以在装备有任意项链时施放它 。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by donating an item from the future to the Artisan's Guild.
str.local: 你从未来捐赠任意一个物品给 工匠行会可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: (*) Note that you will also need to know Literacy: Common and one of the other literacies.
str.local: (*) 注意：你需要读写：常识 以及另一项读写天赋。

str.value: Allows you to read Bestial tomes with a Fairy Jizzed Bull Horn while levitating (*).
str.local: 允许你通过仙女摧残过的牛角 并在浮空时阅读兽性典籍 (*) 。

str.value: Once you have learned a Bestial spell you can cast it while having a horn in your backpack.
str.local: 一旦你学会了一门兽性法术， 你就可以在背包中有牛角时施 放它。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by attempting to donate an unidentified horn to the Artisan's Guild.
str.local: 向工匠行会捐赠一个未鉴定的 牛角可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: (*) Note that you will also need to know Literacy: Common and one of the other literacies.
str.local: (*) 注意：你需要读写：常识 以及另一项读写天赋。

str.value: Allows you to read Abyssal tomes with an Engraved Pyramidion and a black soul gem (*).
str.local: 允许你通过一个雕花金字塔和 一颗黑色魂晶阅读深渊典籍 ( *)。

str.value: Once you have learned an Abyssal spell you can cast it while having a pyramidion in your backpack.
str.local: 一旦你学会了一门深渊法术， 你就可以在背包中有金字塔时 施放它。

str.value: This heritage can be unlocked by attempting to donate an unidentified pyramidion to the Artisan's Guild.
str.local: 向工匠行会捐赠一个未鉴定的 金字塔可以解锁这项遗产。

str.value: (*) Note that you will also need to know Literacy: Common and one of the other literacies.
str.local: (*) 注意：你需要读写：常识 以及另一项读写天赋。

str.id: This challenge can't be unlocked on casual difficulty level.
str.value: This challenge can't be unlocked on casual difficulty level.
str.local: 这项挑战无法在休闲难度级别 下完成。

str.id: The description of this challenge is hidden until it is completed.
str.value: The description of this challenge is hidden until it is completed.
str.local: 这项挑战的说明只有在完成后 才可见。

str.value: It also requires draining the swamp so you might want to start there.
str.local: 它还需要排干沼泽，或许你该 从那里开始。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by killing an enemy with a healing potion.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要用一瓶治疗 药剂杀死敌人完成。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by causing 25 or more damage to an enemy with a single shot.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要用单发射击 对一个敌人造成 25 点或更高 伤害。

str.value: Instant kill effects do not count.
This challenge can be completed by killing an uninjured level 10+ enemy with a single hit from a thrown weapon.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要用一发投掷 武器杀死一个无伤的 10+ 级敌 人。

str.value: Instant kill effects do not count.
This challenge can be completed by killing an uninjured monster while causing damage only with your bare hands.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你赤手空拳 杀死一个无伤的巨怪。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by killing all Heroes of Hallwood in the final battle.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你在终局之 战中杀死所有的圣林英雄。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by clearing a dungeon consisting of three or more levels with cursed jewelry.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你带着被诅 咒的珠宝清空至少有三层的地 牢。

str.value: You must have a cursed amulet and two cursed rings equipped at the time the dungeon is reset.
str.local: 你必须在重置地牢时就带上一 条被诅咒的项链和两枚被诅咒 的戒指。

str.value: Closing an entrance does not count.
This challenge can be completed by reaching level 20 without lighting any torches.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你在升到 2 0 级之前不点燃任何一处壁火 。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by killing yourself using telekinesis.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你用念动力 杀死自己。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by completing all other challenges.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你完成所有 其它挑战。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by enslaving a daemon while having a human, undead, beast and monster friends
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你同时拥有 人类，亡灵，野兽，巨怪伙伴 时，再奴役一个恶魔。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by finishing the following encounters in a single game:
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你完成以下 遭遇战：

str.value: This challenge can be completed by having %d or more ability points without buffs or debuffs.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你在没有 B uff 的情况下拥有 %d 或更多 点属性。

str.value: Note that this challenge is triggered at the end of a turn and it cannot be completed while in town.
str.local: 注意：这项挑战在回合结束时 触发，并且不能在城镇中完成 。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by reaching level %d without killing anyone or anything.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你在不杀死 任何东西的条件下升到 %d 级 。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by regaining full health after casting Divine Shield while having only one health
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你在只剩一 点生命时施放神圣之盾，然后 将生命回满。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by having six unused talent points.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你有六点没 使用的天赋点。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by having %d gold coins in your backpack.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你的背包中 有 %d 枚金币。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by killing an uninjured monster with a single blow.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你单次打击 杀死一个无伤的巨怪。

str.value: Instant kill effects do not count.
This challenge can be completed by looting the crown after dying at least once.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你在拾取到 王冠前至少差点死亡一次。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by failing a reflex check while having Lightning Reflexes heritage and Sixth Sense
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你在同时有 第六感天赋和闪电反应遗产时 ，还是未能通过反射检定。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by having 20 ability damage effects that reduce all abilities by 5.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你身上有 2 0 个属性伤害效果，它们把你 的属性点总和降到 5 。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by killing a creature that has hit you for %d or more points of damage with a single
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你杀死一个 生物，该生物曾一击给你造成 过 %d 或更多点的伤害。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by learning all Celestial, Draconic and Infernal spells in a single game.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你在单次游 戏中学会所有的天使系、龙系 和地狱系法术。

str.value: Enables the cloak style and color selection during character creation.
str.local: 开启创建角色阶段的披风样式 及颜色选项。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by showing your inner rogue and killing your puppy eyed soul mate.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你展示内心 深处的浪子，杀死你那有着一 双可爱大眼睛的灵魂伴侣。

str.value: Unlocks the option to select left and right cloak styles at the start of the game.
str.local: 解锁游戏开始时选择左右披风 样式的选项。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by starting the final battle with %d or more undead friends.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你带着 %d 或更多个亡灵伙伴进入终局之 战。

str.value: Unlocks the option to select red cloak color at the start of the game.
str.local: 解锁游戏开始时红色披风的选 项。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by killing five or more enemies with a single melee attack.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你用一次近 战攻击杀死五个或更多的敌人 。

str.value: Unlocks the option to select green cloak color at the start of the game.
str.local: 解锁游戏开始时绿色披风的选 项。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by equipping a weapon that has ten or more poison effects.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你装备一件 淬有十种或更多种毒药的武器 。

str.value: Unlocks the option to select blue cloak color at the start of the game.
str.local: 解锁游戏开始时蓝色披风的选 项。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by killing an uninjured drake with frozen orbs.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你用冰球杀 死一条无伤的龙。

str.value: Instant kill effects do not count.
Unlocks the option to select purple cloak color at the start of the game.
str.local: 解锁游戏开始时紫色披风的选 项。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by obtaining the ring of power.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你获得那枚 魔戒。

str.value: Unlocks the option to select black cloak color at the start of the game.
str.local: 解锁游戏开始时黑色披风的选 项。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by having ten or more curse effects at the same time.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你同时承受 十种或更多的诅咒。

str.value: Unlocks the option to select white cloak color at the start of the game.
str.local: 解锁游戏开始时白色披风的选 项。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by having twelve or more buff effects at the same time.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你同时拥有 十二个或更多的 Buff 效果。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by regaining full health after spending %d or more turns in lava.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你在岩浆里 坚持 %d 或更多回合后生命回 满。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by regaining full health after being surrounded by %d dwellers and/or lurkers.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你在被 %d 只水怪或潜伏者包围后将生命 回满。

str.value: Note that being levitated while surrounded prevents that part of this challenge from triggering (so don't levitate).
str.local: 注意：在被包围后浮空会阻止 触发这项挑战（所以不要浮空 ）。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by killing %d enemies in a row without being hit by a melee, ranged or spell attack.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你连续杀死 %d 敌人，期间不被近战、远 程、魔法攻击到。

str.value: Note that snails and charmed creatures do not count.
str.local: 注意：蜗牛和倍魅惑的生物不 计入内。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by regaining %d points of health by life draining enemies.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你从敌人那 里吸取 %d 点生命。

str.value: Note that any other form of healing resets the counter.
str.local: 注意：任何其它形式的生命回 复都会重置计数器。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by doing the following:
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你做以下事 情：

str.value: This challenge can be completed by by eating the following monsters while polymorphed:
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你在被变形 后吃掉下列巨怪：

str.value: This challenge can be completed by killing %d under aged daemons at level 20 after typing:
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你杀死 %d 个 20 级未成年恶魔后，输入 ：

str.value: This challenge can be completed by finding and resurrecting Ken'nih before his corpse is eaten by rats.
str.local: 在老鼠吃掉肯'尼斯的尸体前找 到它，就能完成这个挑战。

str.value: Note that this can be attempted only once per game and you must be polymorphed in order to complete it.
str.local: 注意：每局游戏只能尝试一次 ，为了完成挑战你必须被变形 。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by having Woof cause any damage to the King.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你的汪汪对 国王造成伤害。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by looting the crown on heroic difficulty level.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你在英雄难 度级别下取得王冠。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by killing Dreadlord Nabon and ending his reign of terror.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你杀死黑暗 之主腊崩，终结他的恐怖统治 。

str.value: Unlocks "%s" title and adds runes to loot tables.
str.local: 解锁 "%s" 头衔， 在拾取表中增加符石。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by making sure that dwarves won't be added in the game anytime soon.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你确认矮人 不会很快加入游戏。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by befriending an infernal.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你和地狱恶 魔和平相处。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by having three permanent drake friends at the same time.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你永久的让 三条龙作为伙伴。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by causing at least %d points of enchanted elemental damage before resistances
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你在一次近 战或远程攻击中，元素附魔效 果造成未抵抗的 %d 点伤害。

str.value: with a single melee or ranged hit.
This challenge can be completed by viewing your stats while having %d immunities (press Ctrl in the inventory).
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你在同时拥 有 %d 种免疫效果时查看自己 的状态（弹出物品栏时按下 C trl）。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by completing the following steps:%s
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你完成以下 步骤：%s

str.value: This challenge can be completed by having a treeman heal four or more other treemen in one turn.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你有一个树 人在一个回合内治愈四个或更 多的树人。

str.value: Note that it's easier to spawn a treeman when you increase your critical hit modifier.
str.local: 注意：提升你的暴击修正会更 容易诞生出树人。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by killing a merchant and all his henchmen with giant rats.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你用巨鼠杀 死一个商人及其所有随从。

str.value: Note that the challenge fails if any of the targets is killed by something other than a giant rat.
str.local: 注意：如果任一目标被巨鼠之 外的东西杀死都会导致挑战失 败。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by slaying a demonrat that is properly triggered.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你杀掉一只 可能被激发的魔鼠。

str.value: Note that triggered demonrats have a hateful aura that reflects damage.
str.local: 注意：激发的魔鼠带有一个憎 恶光环可以反弹伤害。

str.value: Unlocks "%s" title and enables legendary effects.
str.local: 解锁 "%s" 头衔并 开启传奇效果。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by naming a weapon "Orangutang" and using it to slay %d swamp monsters.
str.local: 完成这项挑战 需要你将一件武器 命名为 "Orangutang" （译注：橙色之刃）并用它杀死 %d 沼泽巨怪。

str.value: Note that it should be wielded in the main hand while killing lurkers and or dwellers.
str.local: 注意：在杀死潜伏者或水怪时 ，武器必须握在主手。

str.value: This legendary effect can be imbued by taming a cave bear.
str.local: 灌注此传奇效果需要驯服一只 洞熊。

str.value: This legendary effect can be imbued by casting Divine Shield while below 25% health and adjacent to an enemy.
str.local: 灌注此传奇效果需要在生命值 低于 25% 且临接一个敌人时施 放神圣之盾。

str.value: This legendary effect can be imbued by reading a master's scroll of light.
str.local: 灌注此传奇效果需要阅读一本 大师级的光明卷轴。

str.value: This legendary effect can be imbued by killing a demonrat.
str.local: 灌注此传奇效果需要杀死一只 魔鼠。

str.value: This legendary effect can be imbued by jumping over a lava chasm.
str.local: 灌注此传奇效果需要跃过一个 熔岩峡谷。

str.value: This legendary effect can be imbued by turning invisible when you cast Plane Shift.
str.local: 灌注此传奇效果需要在你施放 位面传送的同时进入隐身状态 。

str.value: This legendary effect can be imbued by applying a potent deadly poison on the weapon.
str.local: 灌注此传奇效果需要将一瓶强 效死亡药剂淬在武器上。

str.value: This legendary effect can be imbued by killing an enemy with splash damage of an enlarged orb.
str.local: 灌注此传奇效果需要你用增大 的法术球的溅射杀死一个敌人 。

str.value: This legendary effect can be imbued by killing Woof.
str.local: 灌注此传奇效果需要你杀死汪 汪。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by being known as '%s' after finishing the test of leadership.
str.local: 完成这项挑战需要你在完成领 导力测试后被视为 ‘%s’ 。

str.value: The test of leadership has three questions and three possible types of answers (cruel, fair and gentle).
str.local: 领导力测试有三个问题及三种 类型的答案（无情、公正和温 和）。

str.value: If you answer the test with one of each types of answers, you will be known as '%s'.
str.local: 如果你测试的答案每种类型都 有，你会被视为‘%s’。

str.value: If you answer the test with cruel and fair answers only, you will be known as '%s'.
str.local: 如果你测试的答案中有无情的 和公正的，你会被视为‘%s’。

str.value: If you answer the test with cruel and gentle answers only, you will be known as '%s'.
str.local: 如果你测试的答案中有无情的 和温和的，你会被视为‘%s’。

str.value: If you answer the test with fair and gentle answers only, you will be known as '%s'.
str.local: 如果你测试的答案中有公正的 和温和的，你会被视为‘%s’。

str.value: If you answer the test with cruel answers only, you will be known as '%s'.
str.local: 如果你测试的答案中只有无情 的，你会被视为‘%s’。

str.value: If you answer the test with fair answers only, you will be known as '%s'.
str.local: If @(26)如果你测试的答案中只有公正的，你会被视为‘%s’。

str.value: If you answer the test with gentle answers only, you will be known as '%s'.
str.local: 如果你测试的答案中只有温和 的，你会被视为‘%s’。

str.value: This challenge can be completed by reseting a dungeon after meeting three angry pops.
str.local: 这项挑战可以在遭遇三个愤怒 的父亲后重置地牢来完成。

str.id: You are asleep and miss your turn.
str.value: You are asleep and miss your turn.
str.local: 你睡着了，失去了一个回合。

str.id: You are paralysed and miss your turn.
str.value: You are paralysed and miss your turn.
str.local: 你被麻痹了，失去了一个回合。

str.id: You are shocked and miss your turn.
str.value: You are shocked and miss your turn.
str.local: 你被震住了，失去了一个回合。

str.id: You are stunned and miss your turn.
str.value: You are stunned and miss your turn.
str.local: 你被眩晕了，失去了一个回合。

str.id: You feel slow and miss your turn.
str.value: You feel slow and miss your turn.
str.local: 你感到变慢了，失去了一个回合。

str.id: You are afraid and try to run away.
str.value: You are afraid and try to run away.

str.id: You can't enter town while polymorphed.
str.value: You can't enter town while polymorphed.
str.local: 你被变形后不能进入城镇。

str.id: You can't enter town while shapeshifted.
str.value: You can't enter town while shapeshifted.
str.local: 你变身了，不能进入城镇。

str.id: You can't use entrances at the moment.
str.value: You can't use entrances at the moment.

str.id: Press %s to travel back to town.
str.value: Press %s to travel back to town.

str.id: You can't travel at the moment.
str.value: You can't travel at the moment.

str.id: You can't fully rest while enemies are nearby.
str.value: You can't fully rest while enemies are nearby.
str.local: 当附近有敌人时，你无法完全休息。

str.id: You can't fully rest while hunger or thirst is not satiated.
str.value: You can't fully rest while hunger or thirst is not satiated.
str.local: 当你的饥饿或口渴状态未被满足时，无法完全休息。

str.id: You can't bind hotkeys while shapeshifted.
str.value: You can't bind hotkeys while shapeshifted.
str.local: 你不能在变身后绑定热键。
你不能在盲眼状态拾取。
你不能在混乱状态拾取。
你不能在被变形时拾取。

你看见了一个严肃的 STR_MAN 。
你看见了一个阴险的 STR_MAN 。
你看见了一个结实的 STR_MAN 。
你看见了一个傲慢的 STR_MAN 。

str.value: You see a STR_MAN that seems self-righteous.
str.local: 你看见了一个 STR_MAN ，看起来很自以为是。

str.value: You see a STR_MAN who seems holier than thou.
str.local: 你看见了一个 STR_MAN ，看起来很自负。

str.value: You see a STR_MAN who seems somewhat rugged.
str.local: 你看见了一个 STR_MAN ，看起来很顽强。

str.value: Who did you say you are?
I didn't, but I'm STR_NAME, and you are?
So, what is it that you do?
I'm here to protect my master, STR_MASTER.
Straight to business eh? Well, I'm a merchant.
str.local: 开门见山吧？嗯，我是一个商人。

str.value: I'm a merchant and I trade and identify items here.
str.local: 我是一个商人，做点生意还能鉴定物品。

str.value: That time of the month eh?
Keep going and I'll show you what time it is.
str.local: 继续，我会告诉你现在是什么时候了。

str.value: Die, die, die, seriously, just die!
Not before you roll over and die!
It's time for you to die now.
Tell me more about your master.
str.local: 给我讲讲更多你师傅的事。

str.value: I can't do that, now go away.
If you want to live, you better help me now...
str.local: 如果你想活下去，最好现在帮助我……

str.value: I can see the way you look at me. What if...
str.local: 我能看到你看着我的样子。如果……

str.value: STR_NAME seems happy to be alive.
str.local: STR_NAME 看起来很高兴能活着。
STR_NAME 看起来受到严重打击。
什么，为什么，你个小婊子 ?!?

str.value: Your soul mate looks at you with puppy eyes.
str.local: 你的灵魂伴侣用一双可爱的大眼睛盯着你。

str.value: I'm sorry but it's because of me, not you.
str.local: 抱歉，这都是我的问题，和你无关。

str.value: You can almost feel how the puppy eyes shatter.
str.local: 你完全能感受到那双可爱的大眼睛中的震惊。

str.value: Can you teach me any new tricks?
Do you know any fancy moves?
str.local: 你知道什么炫酷的招数？

str.value: Perhaps, if you are ready to learn...
str.local: 或许，如果你已经准备好学习……

str.value: Ready to learn some new tricks?
str.local: 准备好学习一些新技巧了吗？

str.value: Ready to learn some fancy moves?
str.local: 准备好学习一些新招数了吗？

str.value: Do you know any cool spells?
str.local: 你会什么有趣的法术吗？

str.value: Do you know any other spells?
Yes, but only one well enough to teach.
Can you teach me those other spells?
Hrmph, you're back. Are you ready now?
str.local: 哈，你又回来了。现在准备好了吗？

str.value: I've already told you enough, now go away.
str.local: 我已经都告诉你了，你现在走吧。

str.value: Are you sure that is what you want?
str.local: 你确定那就是你想要的？

str.value: Let me think about this again.
Try not to think too hard.
So, the first thing you need to know is that...
str.local: 所以，你要知道的第一件事是……

str.value: So, all you have to do is say these words...
str.local: 所以，你要做的就是念出这些……

str.value: After carefully examining your answers, the powers that be have come to a conclusion.
str.local: 在仔细检查了你的回答后，当权者有了个结论 。

str.value: You are hereby known as %s %s the %s.
Why hello there. I'm Death and I've been expecting you.
str.local: 嘿，你好。我是死神，我一直在等着你。

str.value: By the way, you're going straight to hell because you overstayed your visit in life.
str.local: 顺便说一句，你将直接下地狱，因为你活得太 久了。

str.value: What took you so long? I almost got worried that maybe you weren't coming after all.
str.local: 是什么耽误了你这么久？我都担心你不会来了 。

str.value: I almost had to call in favors to get you here but I'm glad you managed to come on your own.
str.local: 你老是不来，我差点去喊人了。不过我很高兴 你最终自己来了。

str.value: You could've come earlier but don't worry, there's plenty of heat here to keep your soup hot.
str.local: 你应该早点来的，不过没关系，这里有足够的 热量烧热你的汤。

str.value: Thank you for not wasting my time any more than you did. Now move along and enjoy your stay.
str.local: 谢谢你不再浪费我的时间。现在走吧，祝你住 的愉快。

str.value: Thank you for coming to me so soon. Now let me reward you with everlasting agony.
str.local: 谢谢你这么快就来见我。现在让我给你不朽之 爱。

str.value: - You did say rich with filth, right?
- I see you're into twins. Let's make that two...
str.local: - 我看见你变成了双胞胎。那么就满足两……

str.value: - You get a feeling that you have just been fooled.
str.local: - 你感觉你刚刚被愚弄了。

str.id: I would like to learn this '%s'.
str.value: I would like to learn this '%s'.

str.id: Can you teach me this '%s' spell?
str.value: Can you teach me this '%s' spell?
str.local: 你能教教我这个 '%s' 法术吗?

str.id: You can't learn more talents at the moment.
str.value: You can't learn more talents at the moment.
str.local: 当前你不能再学习更多的天赋。

str.value: You feel like choking to death.

str.id: You feel like dying of hunger.
str.value: You feel like dying of hunger.

str.id: You feel like drowning to death.
str.value: You feel like drowning to death.
str.local: 你感觉喝得太多快要死了。

str.value: You feel like dying of thirst.
Strength modifier applies to melee to-hit rolls, melee damage rolls, thrown weapon damage rolls, block modifier,

str.local: 魅力修正影响恢复性法术和防御性法术的命中骰， 说服检定，商品价格。魅力还有机会开启和 NPC 的 特殊交互菜单。

str.value: These are the six resistances from left to right: Physical, Fire, Frost, Shock, Poison and Disease.
str.local: 从左至右共有六项抗性：物理、火焰、冰霜、震击 、毒害、疾病。

str.value: The left and right values indicate resistance against critical hits (head) and normal hits (body).

str.value: Besides having different hit location, critical hits can also confuse, disarm or cause bleeding.
str.local: 除了攻击部位不同，暴击还会引起混乱、缴械、导 致流血。

str.value: Note that you can halve the duration of the confusion effect by using a closed helmet.
str.local: 注意：带上一个封闭型头盔可以让混乱效果的持续 时间减半。

str.local: 你被弄瞎了，这允许你不用踢墙就撞进墙里面，这 太神奇了。

str.value: You are charmed and you are forced to attack the nearest creature that is also an enemy of the charmer or miss
str.local: 你被魅惑了，你被迫攻击附近的施魅者的敌人。如 果没有这样的生物，你会失去你的回合。

str.value: your turn if no such creature exists.
You are chilled and that may cause you to miss your turn.
str.local: 你被冰冻了，这会导致你失去回合。

str.value: You are confused and that allows you to play this game as if you were drunk while sober.
str.local: 你被混乱了，这让你在清醒时也像醉酒了一样玩这 个游戏。

str.value: You are deafened and that prevents you from enjoying the awesome sounds of this game.
str.local: 你被致聋了，这会阻止你欣赏游戏中超赞的音效。

str.value: You are energised and that allows you to re-roll failed energy regeneration checks.
str.local: 你精力充沛，这让你可以重掷失败的精力回复检定 。

str.value: You are envious and you are forced to move towards and attack the nearest creature of the same gender or miss
str.local: 你充满嫉妒，你被迫向附近相同性别的生物移动并 攻击对方。如果没有这种生物则失去回合。

str.value: your turn if no such creature exists.
You are frenzied and you are forced to move towards and attack the nearest creature or miss your turn if no such
str.local: 你狂乱了，你被迫向附近的生物移动并攻击对方。 如果没有生物则失去回合。

str.value: You are greedy and you are forced to move towards the nearest item and attempt to pick it up or miss your turn if
str.local: 你很贪婪，你被迫向附近的物品移动并拾取它。如 果附近没有物品，则失去回合。

str.value: You are hastened and that allows you to act twice in one turn every now and then.
str.local: 你被加速了，这让你可以从现在开始将一个回合视 为两个。

str.value: You are insightful and that allows you to identify items just by picking them up.
str.local: 你顿悟了，这让你在拾取物品时同时鉴定它们。

str.value: You are invisible and that is just unfair towards the lovely creatures that want to kill you.
str.local: 你隐身了，这对那些想杀死你的可爱生物来说极不 公平。

str.value: You are levitated and that allows you to float over traps without getting stuck.
str.local: 你漂浮起来，这让你可以飘过陷阱而不会陷入。

str.value: You are lustful and you are forced to move towards the nearest creature of the opposite gender and beat that
str.local: 你变得好色，你被迫向附近不同性别的生物移动并 把对方打服。如果没有这种生物则失去回合。

str.value: creature into submission or miss your turn if no such creature exists.
You are on fire. You can always try to douse yourself with a water flask.
str.local: 你着火了。这种时候你可以试着用水袋打湿自己。

str.value: You are paralysed and that causes you to miss your turn.
str.local: 你被麻痹了，这让你失去了回合。

str.value: You are polymorphed and that allows you to find Ken'nih.
str.local: 你被变形了，这能让你找到肯'尼斯。

str.value: You are reckless and you are forced to move towards and attack the nearest enemy creature or miss your turn if no
str.local: 你变得鲁莽，你被迫向附近的敌人移动并攻击对方 。如果没有敌人则失去回合。

str.value: You are shocked and that causes you to miss your turn.
str.local: 你被震击了，这导致你失去了回合。

str.value: You are silenced and that prevents you from casting spells and reading scrolls.
str.local: 你被沉默了，这使你无法施法或阅读卷轴。

str.value: You are slowed and that may cause you to miss your turn.
str.local: 你被迟缓了，这可能让你失去回合。

str.value: You are stunned and that causes you to miss your turn.
str.local: 你被眩晕了，这导致你失去了回合。

str.value: You are vitalised and that allows you to re-roll failed health regeneration checks.
str.local: 你活力四射，这允许你重掷失败的生命回复检定。

str.value: You have gained the ability to regenerate but you are also vulnerable to fire.
str.local: 你获得了持续回复的能力，但同时也变得更加怕火 。

str.id: You have temporarily gained knowledge of the %s talent.
str.value: You have temporarily gained knowledge of the %s talent.
str.local: 你临时获得了有关%s天赋的知识。

str.value: You are bleeding and take D3 points of bleed damage per turn.
str.local: 你在流血，每个回合承受 D3 点流血伤害。

str.id: You have 1 bolt or arrow equipped.
str.value: You have 1 bolt or arrow equipped.

str.id: You have %d bolts or arrows equipped.
str.value: You have %d bolts or arrows equipped.

str.id: Your weapon must be reloaded by resting before it can be used again.
str.value: Your weapon must be reloaded by resting before it can be used again.
str.local: 你的武器必须先通过休息来装弹才能再次使用。

str.id: Your main hand weapon is poisoned.
str.value: Your main hand weapon is poisoned.
The spell contained in your amulet is on cooldown. Recharge it by having it equipped for as many turns as it says.
str.local: 你项链中的法术在冷却中。需要通过装备它并经过 它所述的回合数才可以再次使用。

str.value: You can learn a talent now. Find a trainer or use one of the trainer tiles (altar, dummy, fireplace, target, well or totem).
str.local: 你现在可以学习一项新的天赋。找一个导师或使用 一种训练地块（祭坛、假人、火堆、箭靶、水井或 是图腾）。

str.value: As you place the crown on your head, whispers start hearing in the hallways growing stronger with every breath you take:
str.local: 随着你把王冠戴在头上，走廊里的窃窃私语伴随着你每一次呼吸越发清晰入耳：

str.value: You have defeated %s in a fair challenge and you are now the rightful ruler of Frostmourn.
str.local: 你在一次公平挑战中击败了%s，现在你成为了霜之哀伤的合法统治者。

str.value: According to the ancient laws, it is now your right to have your way with the servants in any way that pleases you.
str.local: 根据古代的律法，现在你有权力对你的侍从做任何事，让他们用你喜欢的方式侍奉你。

str.value: Should you become bored or there's animosity amongst your people, you can always throw a few peasants down from the walls.
str.local: 如果你感到无聊或者你发觉你的人民对你有敌意，你可以把一些农民从墙上扔下去。

str.value: Be as it may, you are now ready for the test of leadership...
str.local: 既然如此，现在可以开始对你的领导力做点测试了……

str.value: %s managed to hoard a total of %d gold coins during those %d turns %s quest lasted.
str.local: %s囤积了总共 %d 枚金币，经历了 %d 回合，完成了 %s 个任务。

str.value: %s %s managed to hoard a total of %d gold coins during those %d turns %s journey lasted.
str.local: %s %s囤积了总共 %d 枚金币，经历了 %d 回合直到%s旅程结束。
- 开始就拥有职业关联能力。
- 开始就拥有职业关联装备。
- 开始就拥有职业关联天赋。

str.id: - Traps and snares do less damage.
str.value: - Traps and snares do less damage.

str.local: - 物品不经鉴定即可售卖。
- 成为国王后无法被记录。

str.value: Warriors rely on brute force and melee weapons to deal with their enemies.
str.local: 武士善用蛮力和近战武器对付敌人 。

str.value: They quickly approach their enemies and finish them off with a series of crushing blows.
str.local: 他们迅速地接近敌人，用一套粉碎 打击干掉对手。

str.value: Archers rely on perception and ranged weapons to deal with their enemies.
str.local: 射手极具洞察力，善用远程武器干 掉敌人。

str.value: They maintain optimal range to their enemies and snipe them down with a few well aimed shots.
str.local: 他们尽量和敌人拉开距离，通过几 发精准的射击干掉对手。

str.value: Assassins rely on stealth and initiative to deal with their enemies.
str.local: 刺客擅长隐秘行动，对敌人主动发 起攻击。

str.value: They silently move in for the first strike and quickly finish any survivors with a blade flurry.
str.local: 他们潜行抢先发起攻击，用剑刃乱 舞快速地解决一息尚存的敌人。

str.value: Paladins rely on Celestial magic to buff them and keep them alive as they rid the world of evil.
str.local: 天使系法术让圣骑士活下来驱散世 界中的邪恶。

str.value: Wizards rely on Draconic magic to aid them in their innate quest to seek more knowledge and power.
str.local: 法师依靠龙系法术来追寻更多知识 和力量来完成他们的使命。

str.value: Warlocks rely on Infernal magic to help them accomplish their nefarious deeds and ambitions.
str.local: 术士依靠地狱系法术来完成他们邪 恶的野心。

str.id: - Start with a shirt and dagger.
str.value: - Start with a shirt and dagger.
str.local: - 开始只装备有衬衫和匕首。

str.id: - The snail cushion is not there.
str.value: - The snail cushion is not there.

str.local: - 解锁 弑君者 头衔。

str.id: Steam must be running to play this game.
str.value: Steam must be running to play this game.
str.local: 玩游戏时 Steam 必须处于运行状态。

str.id: Unable to connect to the server.
str.value: Unable to connect to the server.

str.id: Disconnected by the server due to another session.
str.value: Disconnected by the server due to another session.
str.local: 因为有另一个会话，所以从服务器断开。

str.id: Thank you for trying to cheat. Your account is now deleted. Have a good day.
str.value: Thank you for trying to cheat. Your account is now deleted. Have a good day.
str.local: 谢谢你尝试作弊。你的账号现在被删除了。祝你度过美好的一天。

str.id: Singleton data save failed due to a file system error.
str.value: Singleton data save failed due to a file system error.
str.local: 因为文件系统错误，全局数据保存失败。

str.id: Achievement data save failed due to a file system error.
str.value: Achievement data save failed due to a file system error.
str.local: 因为文件系统错误，成就数据保存失败。

str.id: Highscore data save failed due to a file system error.
str.value: Highscore data save failed due to a file system error.
str.local: 因为文件系统错误，最高分数据保存失败。

str.id: Key config data save failed due to a file system error.
str.value: Key config data save failed due to a file system error.
str.local: 因为文件系统错误，键盘配置数据保存失败。

str.id: Statistic data save failed due to a file system error.
str.value: Statistic data save failed due to a file system error.
str.local: 因为文件系统错误，状态数据保存失败。

str.id: Hero creation failed due to a file system error.
str.value: Hero creation failed due to a file system error.
str.local: 因为文件系统错误，英雄无法创建。

str.id: Hero deletion failed due to a file system error.
str.value: Hero deletion failed due to a file system error.
str.local: 因为文件系统错误，英雄无法删除。

str.id: Hero saving failed due to a file system error.
str.value: Hero saving failed due to a file system error.
str.local: 因为文件系统错误，英雄保存失败。

str.id: Hero loading failed due to a file system error.
str.value: Hero loading failed due to a file system error.
str.local: 因为文件系统错误，英雄加载失败。

str.id: %s You have to wait two seconds before sending another message.
str.value: %s You have to wait two seconds before sending another message.
str.local: %s 你必须等两秒钟才能发下一条消息。

str.id: You can view and change key bindings in the main menu %s.
str.value: You can view and change key bindings in the main menu %s.
str.local: 你可以在主菜单 %s 浏览和修改热键。

str.id: Type %s to set the number of search attempts (using values 1 through 6).
str.value: Type %s to set the number of search attempts (using values 1 through 6).
str.local: 输入 %s 来设置搜索尝试次数（从 1 到 6）。

str.id: Search attempts has been set to %d.
str.value: Search attempts has been set to %d.
str.local: 搜索尝试次数被设置为 %d 。
物品现在以垂直方式排序。
物品现在以水平方式排序。

str.id: Tutorial dog is ready to guide you once more.
str.value: Tutorial dog is ready to guide you once more.
str.local: 界面狗准备好再引导你一次。

str.id: Tutorial dog can only be reset while in dungeon.
str.value: Tutorial dog can only be reset while in dungeon.
str.local: 界面狗只能在地牢中才可以重置。

str.id: Null strings are now printed on the log.
str.value: Null strings are now printed on the log.
str.local: 现在空字符串会在记录中打印。

str.id: Null strings are no longer printed on the log.
str.value: Null strings are no longer printed on the log.
str.local: 现在空字符串不会在记录中打印。

str.id: Third leg starts to wiggle and it attempts to fill your every orifice before exploding to pieces.
str.value: Third leg starts to wiggle and it attempts to fill your every orifice before exploding to pieces.
str.local: 第三条腿开始扭动，试图从你身上的每一个孔钻进去。它即将爆炸。

str.id: Press %s and type %s to view some basic info.
str.value: Press %s and type %s to view some basic info.
str.local: 按下 %s 然后输入 %s 可以浏览一下基本信息。

str.id: Hover mouse over your abilities to see how they function.
str.value: Hover mouse over your abilities to see how they function.
str.local: 将鼠标停留在你的属性点上可以看到它们起怎样的效果。

str.id: Boulders can be pushed over entrances to clear a dungeon.
str.value: Boulders can be pushed over entrances to clear a dungeon.
str.local: 把巨石推入入口可以清空地牢。

str.id: There are hidden menus behind the keys %s, %s, %s and %s.
str.value: There are hidden menus behind the keys %s, %s, %s and %s.
str.local: 在按键 %s, %s, %s 和 %s 后面藏有隐藏菜单。
